XXbsa052_u:1087: na laukikeṣu kāryeṣu kuto na śraiyaseṣu ca // Dhs_6.151 //
XXbsa052_u:1089: yathā śubhaṃ parikṣīṇaṃ bhaviṣyati divaukasām // Dhs_6.152 //
XXbsa052_u:1090: pramādaphalaṃ hānikaram tadā pramādasya phalaṃ jñāsyanti kaṭukaṃ hi tat /
XXbsa052_u:1097: cyavamānaṃ suraṃ sarve na kaścidanugacchati // Dhs_6.156 //
XXbsa052_u:1098: mokṣābhilāṣiṇaḥ duṣkṛtaṃ tyajanti karmaṇā pṛṣṭhataḥ sarva gacchantamanuyāti ca /
XXbsa052_u:1099: yuktaṃ ca (hi) sadā sevyaṃ varjanīyaṃ ca duṣkṛtam // Dhs_6.157 //
XXbsa052_u:1100: pramādaṃ ca madaṃ jahayāt pramāda (vi)rato bhavet /
XXbsa052_u:1101: pramādo bhavamūlo 'yaṃ pramādastu na śāntaye // Dhs_6.158 //
XXbsa052_u:1102: pramādāpramādau vicintya dhīraḥ sukhamedhate apramādapramādābhyāmidamuktaṃ svalakṣaṇam /
XXbsa052_u:1103: tad vicintya sadā dhīraḥ sukhaṃ sucaritaṃ caret // Dhs_6.159 //
XXbsa052_u:1104: dharmacārī kadāpi duḥkhaṃ nāpnoti na dharmacārī puruṣaḥ kadācid duḥkhamṛcchaiti /
XXbsa052_u:1105: saṃsarantyatha saṃsāre prāṇinaḥ svena karmaṇā // Dhs_6.160 //
XXbsa052_u:1107: pramādaḥ śreyasāṃ nāśaḥ pramādo bandhanaṃ param // Dhs_6.161 //
XXbsa052_u:1110: apramādarato nirvāṇamadhigacchati tasmāt sukhārthī puruṣaḥ pramādaṃ parivarjayet /
XXbsa052_u:1111: yaiḥ pramādaḥ parityaktaḥ prāptaṃ taiḥ padamacyutam // Dhs_6.163 //
XXbsa052_u:1114: pramattaḥ sadaiva duḥkhito bhavati pramādo vinipātāya hetureṣaḥ prakīrtitaḥ /
XXbsa052_u:1115: pramattaḥ puruṣaḥ sarvaḥ sonmāda iva lakṣyate // Dhs_6.165 //
XXbsa052_u:1117: pramattaḥ puruṣaḥ śakto viparīteṣu vartate // Dhs_6.166 //
XXbsa052_u:1118: hetau karmavipāke ca mṛtyūtpattau tathaiva ca /
XXbsa052_u:1121: ye pramādaṃ vinirjitya nityaṃ jñānaratā narāḥ /
XXbsa052_u:1122: te kleśabandhanaṃ chitvā padaṃ yātāḥ sukhodayam // Dhs_6.168 //
XXbsa052_u:1124: bhramanti vibhave sattvā mā pramādeṣu rakṣathaḥ // Dhs_6.169 //
XXbsa052_u:1125: sukhī bhavati duḥkhī vai duḥkhitaścāpi sukhitaḥ /
XXbsa052_u:1126: bhartāpi tṛpto bhavati mā pramādeṣu rakṣathaḥ // Dhs_6.170 //
XXbsa052_u:1127: mātā pitā vā bhavati bhāryā mātṛtvameva ca /
XXbsa052_u:1128: parivarto mahāneṣu mā pramādeṣu rakṣathaḥ // Dhs_6.171 //
XXbsa052_u:1131: prajñāruḍhaḥ pramādaśūnyaḥ san śivaṃ panthānamāpnoti prajñāprāsādamāroha yogakṣemamanuttamam
XXbsa052_u:1132: eṣa panthāḥ śivaḥ śreṣṭho yaḥ pramādavivarjitaḥ /
XXbsa052_u:1133: tena mārgeṇa satataṃ nirvāṇaṃ yānti paṇḍitāḥ // Dhs_6.173 //
XXbsa052_u:1136: pramādopahatāḥ nāśaṃ yānti smṛti sandūṣakaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ mokṣāya vṛttināśakaḥ /
XXbsa052_u:1137: durgatīnāṃ paraṃ netā pramādaḥ sampravartate // Dhs_6.175 //
XXbsa052_u:1138: aneka puruṣaḥ kṣipto nātmano vindate hitam /
XXbsa052_u:1139: nāvācyaṃ na ca kāryāṇāṃ vindate 'mṛtakopamaḥ // Dhs_6.176 //
XXbsa052_u:1141: pramādopahatā mūḍhā nṛtyanti ca hasanti ca // Dhs_6.177 //
XXbsa052_u:1142: utpannāvicyutāḥ mārgāt kṣāntiṃ ye nāśayanti ca /
XXbsa052_u:1146: sarveṣāṃ śubhakarmāṇāṃ pramādaḥ śatrureva nādhyātmikāni karmāṇi na bāhayāni kathañcana /
XXbsa052_u:1151: mārgāmārga na vindanti jātyandhena surāḥ samāḥ // Dhs_6.182 //
XXbsa052_u:1152: kāmadhātāveva pramattāḥ bhramanti kāmadhātau bhramanyete cakravadgati pañcake /
XXbsa052_u:1153: dhyānebhyo yaddhi patanaṃ tat pramādasya ceṣṭitam // Dhs_6.183 //
XXbsa052_u:1154: pramādaceṣṭitaṃ karmapatanāya jāyate ārūpyebhyaśca yatsthānaṃ caturthaṃ prāpyalaukikāt /
XXbsa052_u:1155: bhramanti bhramadolāyāṃ tat pramādasya ceṣṭitam // Dhs_6.184 //
XXbsa052_u:1157: traidhātukamidaṃ kṛtsnaṃ na ca buddhayantya cetasaḥ // Dhs_6.185 //
XXbsa052_u:1159: na bhūyaḥ khedamāyāti tat pramādasya ceṣṭitam // Dhs_6.186 //
XXbsa052_u:1160: pramādavaśāt duḥkhamevāpnoti janaḥ priyaviśleṣajaṃ nṛṇāṃ yadduḥkhaṃ hṛdi jāyate /
XXbsa052_u:1161: sevanād yat pramādasya kathayanti tathāgatā // Dhs_6.187 //
XXbsa052_u:1162: anarthā hi trayo loke yairidaṃ naśyate jagat /
XXbsa052_u:1163: vyādhirjarā ca mṛtyuśca pramādālasya sambhavāḥ // Dhs_6.188 //
XXbsa052_u:1165: tathā pramādināṃ kleṣāḥ pravartante pṛthagvidhāḥ // Dhs_6.189 //
XXbsa052_u:1166: pramādasya viṣāṅkuraḥ strīśleṣo madyapānaṃ ca krīḍā ca viṣayaiḥ saha /
XXbsa052_u:1168: pramādāpramādayorlakṣaṇam pramādaḥ paramaṃ duḥkhapramādaḥ paraṃ sukham /
XXbsa052_u:1170: ataḥ pramādo na sevyaḥ tasmāt pramādo na nareṇa sevyaḥ, sa durgatīnāṃ prathamāgrameva /
XXbsa052_u:1171: vihāya taṃ duḥkhasahastrayoniṃ, prayānti buddhā bhavapāragrayam //
XXbsa052_u:1174: na kāmeṣu ratiṃ kuryāt kāmāḥ paramavañcakāḥ /
XXbsa052_u:1178: rāgādivaśagānāṃ ceṣṭitam varaṃ niśitadhāreṇa kṣureṇa svayamātmanaḥ /
XXbsa052_u:1179: saṃkṣoditā bhavejjihvā na coktaṃ kāmagaṃva(caḥ) // Dhs_7.3 //
XXbsa052_u:1182: rāgavaśagaḥ sadā duḥkhatamamanubhavati alparāgānniruddho yaḥ kurute duṣkṛtaṃ bahu /
XXbsa052_u:1183: sa rāgavaśago mūḍho duḥkhād duḥkhamavāpnuyāt // Dhs_7.5 //
XXbsa052_u:1184: kāmapariṇatimāha atṛptirasmāt kāmāste na sukhā nāpi śāśvatāḥ /
XXbsa052_u:1187: na rāgavaśagā ye tu na teṣāṃ narakād bhayam // Dhs_7.7 //
XXbsa052_u:1192: kāmānalaḥ narake pātayati indriyāṇīndriyārthajño mohayitvā pṛthagvidhāḥ /
XXbsa052_u:1209: kāṣṭhavad dahyate tena na ca dṛśyo janasya saḥ // Dhs_7.18 //
XXbsa052_u:1210: yathā yathā hi prabalo rāgāgnistapyate mahān /
XXbsa052_u:1211: tathā tathā (ca) rāgāndhaiḥ svasukhaṃ parisevyate // Dhs_7.19 //
XXbsa052_u:1214: viṣayapariṇāmamāha viṣayābhirato janturna sukhī syāt kathañcana /
XXbsa052_u:1215: viṣayāḥ viṣayairdaṣṭāḥ pariṇāme ca dāruṇāḥ // Dhs_7.21 //
XXbsa052_u:1216: nādye nānte na madhye ca nāsmiṃlloke na cāpare /
XXbsa052_u:1217: sukhadā viṣayā kāmaṃ bhavantīha kathañcana // Dhs_7.22 //
XXbsa052_u:1222: kāmamohāndhānāṃ sthitimāha sukhānāṃ kāmacārāṇāṃ mohasya khalu ceṣṭitam /
XXbsa052_u:1223: tadeva yadi devānāṃ khagaiḥ syuste samāḥ surāḥ // Dhs_7.25 //
XXbsa052_u:1227: na tu dṛṣṭiḥ samudrasya rūpārthaistṛptirasti hi // Dhs_7.27 //
XXbsa052_u:1230: mādyante bahumohāndhā na ca buddhayanti bāliśāḥ /
XXbsa052_u:1232: kāmā asārāḥ vañcakāśca bhavanti svapnapramoṣadharmāṇo gandharvanagaropamāḥ /
XXbsa052_u:1239: sarvataḥ pāpakartāraḥ kāmā loke viṣopamāḥ // Dhs_7.33 //
XXbsa052_u:1241: patanti narake mūḍhāḥ kāmena parivañcitāḥ // Dhs_7.34 //
XXbsa052_u:1245: ādau cānte tathā kāmāstasmāt kāmān vivarjayet // Dhs_7.36 //
XXbsa052_u:1246: kāmasevanaphalam yathā yathā hi sevyante vivardhante tathā tathā /
XXbsa052_u:1248: kāmavarjanaphalam āha evaṃ doṣaṃ sadā jñātvā dhīraḥ kāmān vivarjayet /
XXbsa052_u:1250: kāmāgniḥ devānnapi pātayati asaṅkhyāni sahasrāṇi devānāṃ niyutāni ca /
XXbsa052_u:1253: tathā kāmāḥ sadā varjyā hetavo narakasya te // Dhs_7.40 //
XXbsa052_u:1254: na dṛṣṭo na śrutaḥ kaścid yaḥ kāmavaśagaḥ pumān /
XXbsa052_u:1255: na kāmairvipralabdhaḥ syānna ca duḥkhena pīḍitaḥ // Dhs_7.41 //
XXbsa052_u:1259: ahantvāttu bhavet prītirna sā kāmaiḥ kathañcana // Dhs_7.43 //
XXbsa052_u:1261: yā tu kāmavinirmuktā sā ratiḥ pari(bhāṣitā) // Dhs_7.44 //
XXbsa052_u:1262: yoginaḥ paramā gatiḥ tāṃ samāśritya gacchanti yoginaḥ paramāṃ gatim /
XXbsa052_u:1263: na tu kāmakṛtā prītirnayate padamacyutam // Dhs_7.45 //
XXbsa052_u:1264: kāmajaratiṃ nindati āpātamadhurā ramyā vipāke jvalanopamā /
XXbsa052_u:1266: āpātaramyā madhurā madhye ramyā ca sarvadā /
XXbsa052_u:1267: śāntamante ca vimalaṃ nayate padamacyutam // Dhs_7.47 //
XXbsa052_u:1269: tāṃ vyudasya kathaṃ bālā rakṣante (kāmajāṃ ratim) // Dhs_7.48 //
XXbsa052_u:1270: kāmakṛtā ratiḥ nirataṃ tapati madhyādinidhane duḥkhā nityaṃ doṣādibhirvṛtā /
XXbsa052_u:1271: kathaṃ sā sevyate bālairyā na dṛṣṭā sukhāvahā // Dhs_7.49 //
XXbsa052_u:1273: tathā kāmakṛtā prītiḥ pariṇāme viṣopamā // Dhs_7.50 //
XXbsa052_u:1275: dāhena ca prarohaḥ syāt tadvat kāmakṛtā ratiḥ // Dhs_7.51 //
XXbsa052_u:1276: pataṅgaḥ paśyati hyagni dāhadoṣaṃ na paśyati /
XXbsa052_u:1278: yastu rāgakṛto dāhaḥ pacyate kāmināṃ sadā /
XXbsa052_u:1279: pataṅgasadṛśaṃ dāhaṃ sarvathā nai(va) paśyati // Dhs_7.53 //
XXbsa052_u:1280: kāmapramādāt patanaṃ dhruvameva tasmāt kāma(viṣaṃ) tyaktvā nityaṃ jīvatha he surāḥ /
XXbsa052_u:1281: bhavantu mā vṛthā janmapramādena prapātanam // Dhs_7.54 //
XXbsa052_u:1283: taṃ hitvā narakaṃ yānti kāmamohena vañcitāḥ // Dhs_7.55 //
XXbsa052_u:1284: kāmamohitaḥ viṣavṛkṣamayaṃ puṣpaṃ pibati viṣavṛkṣamayaṃ puṣpaṃ pīyate bhramarairyathā /
XXbsa052_u:1285: tathā viṣātmakamidaṃ sukhaṃ bhuṅkte hi mohitaḥ // Dhs_7.56 //
XXbsa052_u:1286: jīveyuḥ pāmarāḥ kecit viṣaṃ pītvāpi durbhagāḥ /
XXbsa052_u:1287: na kāmaviṣapītasya jīvitaṃ durlabhaṃ bhavet // Dhs_7.57 //
XXbsa052_u:1290: kāmāgniḥ hiṃsaka eva śrutipāśamayo vahniḥ pretāneṣa dahatyati /
XXbsa052_u:1294: viṣayāsaktaṃ manaḥ vyasane pātayati viṣayeṣu sadācittaṃ dhāvantaṃ cañcalaṃ mahat /
XXbsa052_u:1295: na tyājyaṃ vyasane mūḍha yad paśyasi bhaviṣyati // Dhs_7.61 //
XXbsa052_u:1297: vyasanaughe samutpanne tat paścāt paritapyate // Dhs_7.62 //
XXbsa052_u:1298: kāmamohitāḥ mahadbhayamapi na paśyanti vṛthā kāmamadairmattā devāḥ prakṛtidurbalāḥ /
XXbsa052_u:1299: bhramanti bhramitāḥ kāmairna paśyanti mahad bhayam // Dhs_7.63 //
XXbsa052_u:1302: kāmāḥ paramavañcakā bhavanti na ca paśyanti (vi)budhāścittena parivañcitāḥ /
XXbsa052_u:1303: kṣaṇikā madhurā jātāḥ kāmāḥ paramavañcakāḥ // Dhs_7.65 //
XXbsa052_u:1304: kāma prati na viśvaset śataśaśca sahastraiśca koṭiśaḥ padmaśastathā /
XXbsa052_u:1305: labdhā naṣṭā punaḥ kāmā na teṣāṃ viścaset pumān // Dhs_7.66 //
XXbsa052_u:1306: kāmairmohitaḥ pataṅgasamo narakāgninā dahyate viṣayād bandhanaṃ tīvraṃ sarve narakahetavaḥ
XXbsa052_u:1308: rāgeṇa rañjitāḥ pūrvaṃ dveṣeṇa ca tiraskṛtāḥ /
XXbsa052_u:1311: sa pataṅgasamo mūḍhaḥ dahyate narakāgninā // Dhs_7.69 //
XXbsa052_u:1312: kāmavaśagāḥ suralokādapi patanti avaśyambhāvi patanaṃ suralokāt samantataḥ /
XXbsa052_u:1313: na jñātvā kāmavaśago syādiha kathañcana // Dhs_7.70 //
XXbsa052_u:1314: kāmena vañcitāḥ sattvāḥ kāmena ca vimohitāḥ /
XXbsa052_u:1316: kāmaṃ tyaktva svahite manaḥ karttavyam tadetad vyasanaṃ sattvāḥ svahite kriyatāṃ manaḥ /
XXbsa052_u:1319: te mūḍhā mṛtyuvaśagāḥ kāmānalahatā narāḥ // Dhs_7.73 //
XXbsa052_u:1321: tṛṣṇāpi tṛptijanikā mano naiva hi tṛpyati // Dhs_7.74 //
XXbsa052_u:1322: jñānadīpenaijendriyāṇāṃ viṣayebhyastṛptirjāyate na jātu viṣayaistṛptirindriyāṇāṃ bhaviṣyati
XXbsa052_u:1323: yadi na jñānadīpena kṣapayiṣyanti (te narāḥ) // Dhs_7.75 //
XXbsa052_u:1324: nārīsevanena nāśaḥ suniścitaḥ yoṣitaḥ sevyamānā hi vitarkaśatamālikāḥ /
XXbsa052_u:1326: kāmāgnidīptāḥ kadāpi śāntiṃ nāpnuvanti taṃ matvā vegarabhasā nityaṃ kāmo 'gnidīpitaḥ /
XXbsa052_u:1329: ramante vibudhāḥ sarve tat sarvaṃ mohaceṣṭitam // Dhs_7.78 //
XXbsa052_u:1332: rāgavivaśā amarā api patanti amarāḥ rāgavivaśā nityaṃ viṣayatatparāḥ /
XXbsa052_u:1335: na ca vindanti yad duḥkhaṃ viprayogo bhaviṣyati // Dhs_7.81 //
XXbsa052_u:1336: viyogajaṃ duḥkhaṃ kaṣṭapradameva yadetat sukhamevādau divyaṃ pañcaguṇānvitam /
XXbsa052_u:1339: satṛṣṇasya tathā tṛptiḥ kāmebhyo naiva jāyate // Dhs_7.83 //
XXbsa052_u:1340: kāmānusevinaḥ duḥkhaṃ kadāpi śāntiṃ nādhigacchati anapekṣitacittasya nityaṃ kāmānusevinaḥ
XXbsa052_u:1343: paścāttu vyasane prāpte jānīte yasya tat phalam // Dhs_7.85 //
XXbsa052_u:1346: viṣayāgnidagdhāḥ narakaṃ yānti yasteṣāṃ viśvaset martyo jñānacakṣurvigarhitaḥ /
XXbsa052_u:1347: viṣayāgnirabhratulyaḥ sa yāti narakaṃ naraḥ // Dhs_7.87 //
XXbsa052_u:1352: na ca bindatyamanaso devā viṣayamohitāḥ // Dhs_7.89 //
XXbsa052_u:1354: na vidanti mahad duḥkhaṃ yadavaśyaṃ bhaviṣyati // Dhs_7.90 //
XXbsa052_u:1356: sa paścād vyasane prāpte mūḍho 'sau vipralapyate // Dhs_7.91 //
XXbsa052_u:1359: ādhyātmikasukhāpekṣayā kāmasukhaṃ hīnatamam yacca kāmasukhaṃ loke yacca tṛṣṇodbhavaṃ sukham
XXbsa052_u:1361: kāmī kadāpi sukhaṃ nāśnute na sukhī vartate tāvadya yasya kāmo hṛdi sthitaḥ /
XXbsa052_u:1364: yatra saukhyaṃ na tatrāsti tṛptirviṣayasevinām // Dhs_7.95 //
XXbsa052_u:1365: sevyamānāḥ sadā kāmā vardhante ca muhurmuhuḥ /
XXbsa052_u:1366: te vardhitā viṣasamā bhavanti vinipātinaḥ // Dhs_7.96 //
XXbsa052_u:1368: na ca teṣāṃ parityāgaṃ kurvanti viṣayotsavāḥ // Dhs_7.97 //
XXbsa052_u:1372: sparśāḥ sammukhasaṃsparśāḥ sevyante naiva tṛpyate // Dhs_7.99 //
XXbsa052_u:1373: śabdaiḥ kāntaiḥ sumadhuraiḥ śrotrameti na tarpaṇam /
XXbsa052_u:1374: mano 'pi tṛptiviśvastaṃ vardhamānaṃ na tṛpyati // Dhs_7.100 //
XXbsa052_u:1375: indriyāṇi kāmabhūmiṣu pātayanti ṣaḍendriyāṇi capalānyādhṛtāni ratau punaḥ /
XXbsa052_u:1377: na tṛptirasti devānāṃ gajānāṃ vai tṛṇairyathā /
XXbsa052_u:1378: analasya svabhāvo 'yaṃ tasya tṛptirna vidyate // Dhs_7.102 //
XXbsa052_u:1381: indriyadagdhā narakaṃ yānti tairayaṃ dahyate loko na ca vindatyabuddhimān /
XXbsa052_u:1382: āsvādabhadrakā hayete narakasya ca hetavaḥ // Dhs_7.104 //
XXbsa052_u:1383: kāmamohitaḥ sukhavañcito bhavati kāmā viṣayalobhāste lelihānā yathoragāḥ /
XXbsa052_u:1384: vilocanavaro hayeṣa na ca kāmairvimohitaḥ // Dhs_7.105 //
XXbsa052_u:1385: kāmavaśīnaraḥ netrahīnā mūḍhataraḥ sukhānusāriṇaḥ kāmo narakānupadhāvati /
XXbsa052_u:1386: na netrahīno narake pātyate satkriyānvitaḥ // Dhs_7.106 //
XXbsa052_u:1387: tasmād varaṃ vicakṣuḥ syānna tu kāmavaśo naraḥ /
XXbsa052_u:1389: kāmacāriṇāṃ jñānādikaṃ durlabham anirvidyanti kāmebhyo mohitāḥ svena cetasā /
XXbsa052_u:1390: na jñānaṃ nāpi vijñānaṃ vidyate kāmacāriṇām // Dhs_7.108 //
XXbsa052_u:1391: kāmaḥ mṛtyubhavanaṃ nayati yad duḥkhakāmajaṃ hatvā punaḥ kāmavaśānugāḥ /
XXbsa052_u:1393: nayanti mṛtyubhavanaṃ durgatīśca punaḥ punaḥ // Dhs_7.109 //
XXbsa052_u:1395: tathā saukhyagataṃ nṛṇāṃ sarvathā na vivartate // Dhs_7.110 //
XXbsa052_u:1397: yo na tṛpyati kāmeṣu sa naro 'dhamagāmikaḥ // Dhs_7.111 //

XXbsa052_u:2328: sarva bhayādikaṃ kaṣṭamanṛtaṃ kīrtitaṃ budhaiḥ // Dhs_12.21 //
XXbsa052_u:2331: satyaṃ tyaktvā mṛṣāvādaṃ yo naraḥ pratipadyate /
XXbsa052_u:2332: ratnaṃ tyaktvā sa pāpātmā pāṣāṇaṃ pratipadyate // Dhs_12.23 //
XXbsa052_u:2333: yasyātmā na bhavet dviṣṭo yasya vā narakaṃ priyam /
XXbsa052_u:2334: mṛṣāvādaṃ svadehāgnim abuddhiḥ sa niṣevate // Dhs_12.24 //
XXbsa052_u:2336: satyaṃ tyaktvā mṛṣāvāde kasmād yānti kubuddhayaḥ // Dhs_12.25 //
XXbsa052_u:2338: guṇāṃstyaktvā kathaṃ mūḍho doṣeṣu paridhāvati // Dhs_12.26 //
XXbsa052_u:2340: tathā satyaṃ sukhasyaiva tasmānnānṛtako bhavet // Dhs_12.27 //
XXbsa052_u:2341: satyavādī hi puruṣaḥ priyaḥ sarvasya dehinaḥ /
XXbsa052_u:2350: anṛtaṃ sarvaduḥkhāntaṃ kaḥ pumān na vivarjayet // Dhs_12.32 //
XXbsa052_u:2351: nānyadeśāgataṃ satyaṃ nānyasmāt prārthyate hi tat /
XXbsa052_u:2353: dīpānāṃ ca paro dīpaḥ satyaṃ buddhena deśitam /
XXbsa052_u:2354: auṣadhānāṃ paraṃ tacca sadā duḥkhaniṣūdanam // Dhs_12.34 //
XXbsa052_u:2356: amṛtaṃ satyamityuktaṃ viṣaṃ tūktaṃ mṛṣāvacaḥ // Dhs_12.35 //
XXbsa052_u:2360: mṛtavat sa pumānasti yo mithyātvabhibhāṣate // Dhs_12.37 //
XXbsa052_u:2361: nātmano hi hitaṃ pathyaṃ (para)sya na kathañcana /
XXbsa052_u:2362: paścāttu paraduḥkhāya tat kathaṃ sevyate nṛbhiḥ // Dhs_12.38 //
XXbsa052_u:2370: nāstyatrāṇaṃ yathā satyamiti dharmavido viduḥ // Dhs_12.42 //
XXbsa052_u:2371: abhidhyāpāśo na sevanīyaḥ satyavadhyā sadā kleśā vajravadhyā yathā nagāḥ /
XXbsa052_u:2372: hatā(ste) puruṣā (jñeyā ye ') bhidhyā parivañcitāḥ // Dhs_12.43 //
XXbsa052_u:2374: abhidhyāmānasaṃ pāśaṃ sevitaṃ na vicakṣaṇaiḥ // Dhs_12.44 //
XXbsa052_u:2377: vyāpādaḥ sattvān mohayatyeva yasmāt tat sarvadā varjyaṃ kaṭukāśāviṣodayam /
XXbsa052_u:2380: atha kūrasvabhāvā ye vyāpādaparamā narāḥ // Dhs_12.47 //
XXbsa052_u:2381: na teṣāṃ vidyate saukhyamādityena yathā tamaḥ /
XXbsa052_u:2382: na dharme nārthanikaro na dharmā na ca bāndhavāḥ // Dhs_12.48 //
XXbsa052_u:2384: tamasāmākaro hyeṣa vyāpāda iha kathyate // Dhs_12.49 //
XXbsa052_u:2386: avyāpādaḥ paraṃ śreyo na vyāpādaḥ kathañcana // Dhs_12.50 //
XXbsa052_u:2387: avyāpādaparā ye tu te yānti padamacyutam /
XXbsa052_u:2389: sa cauraḥ sarvalokasya na cauraḥ prākṛtaḥ smṛtaḥ /
XXbsa052_u:2390: dharmavādī naro yastu carate dharmameva yaḥ // Dhs_12.52 //
XXbsa052_u:2391: sa yāti śāśvataṃ sthānaṃ yatra gatvā na śocyate /
XXbsa052_u:2393: lokottaraiḥ kalpaśataiḥ kadācit kathyate na vā /
XXbsa052_u:2394: tasmāt lokottaraṃ vākyaṃ laukikaṃ na kathañcana // Dhs_12.54 //
XXbsa052_u:2398: hitaṃ tattvaṃ ca yo mūḍho na gṛhṇāti gurorvacaḥ // Dhs_12.56 //
XXbsa052_u:2399: satyavādī sadā devatābhiḥ puraskṛtaḥ sa paścād vyasane prāpte tapyate svena cetasā /
XXbsa052_u:2400: satyavādī sadā dānto devatābhiḥ puraskṛtaḥ // Dhs_12.57 //
XXbsa052_u:2401: priyo bhavati lokasya paścād deveṣu modati /
XXbsa052_u:2403: darśanīyaṃ mukhaṃ cāsya devalokeṣu jāyate // Dhs_12.58 //
XXbsa052_u:2407: mṛṣā vadati yo vācaṃ sadbhūtaguṇanāśikām // Dhs_12.60 //
XXbsa052_u:2411: chettā ca dharmahetūnāṃ mṛṣāvādaḥ pravartate // Dhs_12.62 //
XXbsa052_u:2412: na tasya mātā na pitā buddho nāpi samvaraḥ /
XXbsa052_u:2413: yaḥ pāpabuddhiḥ patito mṛṣāvādaṃ prabhāṣateḥ // Dhs_12.63 //
XXbsa052_u:2415: mucyate devatābhiśca yo vācaṃ bhāṣate mṛṣā // Dhs_12.64 //
XXbsa052_u:2420: ye yathāvādino marttyā na ca tatkāriṇaḥ sadā // Dhs_12.67 //
XXbsa052_u:2421: satyameva svargasya nirvāṇasya ca sopānam satyaṃ svargasya sopānaṃ nirvāṇadvārameva tat /
XXbsa052_u:2422: tasmāt satyaparo nityaṃ nityaṃ dharmagatiḥ smṛtiḥ // Dhs_12.68 //
XXbsa052_u:2423: anṛtaṃ na vadet aśokamajaraṃ sthānaṃ prayāti puruṣottamaḥ /
XXbsa052_u:2428: bhujyate sukṛtaṃ sarva karmabaddhā hi dehinaḥ // Dhs_13.1 //
XXbsa052_u:2431: svayameva phalaṃ bhuṅkte sahāyairbahubhiḥ sārdha kurute karma duṣkṛtam /
XXbsa052_u:2432: ekākī karmaṇastasya phalaṃ bhuṅkte bhave bhave // Dhs_13.3 //
XXbsa052_u:2438: sukṛtaiḥ suralokaṃ gacchanti sukṛtaiḥ suralokeṣu duṣkṛtaiśca tathāpyadhaḥ /
XXbsa052_u:2441: tridoṣajaṃ tricittotthaṃ triṣu dhātuṣu pacyate // Dhs_13.7 //
XXbsa052_u:2444: anyakṛtakarmaṇaḥ phalaṃ nānyo bhuṅkte na hyanyena kṛtaṃ pāpamanyena paripacyate /
XXbsa052_u:2445: sukarmaphaladāyādaḥ prāṇināṃ sarva eva hi // Dhs_13.9 //
XXbsa052_u:2446: pūrvoktānāṃ trividhānāṃ svasya kṛta eva vipāko bhavati karmaṇastrividhasyāsya na cāpyanyasya pacyate /
XXbsa052_u:2448: karmaphalavarṇanam ekaḥ karoti karmāṇi ekaśca phalamaśnute /
XXbsa052_u:2450: jalāpekṣī jano yastu kurute karma duṣkṛtam /
XXbsa052_u:2451: na jano janaśatānāṃ bhuṅkte hi vyañjanaṃ (kvacit) // Dhs_13.12 //
XXbsa052_u:2452: na hyanyena kṛtaṃ karma saṅkrāmatyaparasya tat /
XXbsa052_u:2455: tena carati saṃsāre prerite karmavāyunā // Dhs_13.14 //
XXbsa052_u:2463: duḥkhād duḥkhataraṃ yānti yebhyaḥ dharmo na rocate // Dhs_13.17 //
XXbsa052_u:2467: manuṣyāḥ pretaviṣaye narakaṃ vā prayānti hi // Dhs_13.19 //
XXbsa052_u:2468: sukarmaṇaiva sukham anyonyaprabhavaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ duḥkhaṃ vā yadi vā sukham /
XXbsa052_u:2471: tatra śakyaṃ budhairgantuṃ varjayitvā tathāgataiḥ // Dhs_13.21 //
XXbsa052_u:2472: nādharmasya phalaṃ sādhu viparītaṃ na pacyate /
XXbsa052_u:2473: hetoḥ sadṛśatā dṛṣṭā jalasya vividhasya vai // Dhs_13.22 //
XXbsa052_u:2474: sādṛśyasya hetuphalaṃ viparītaṃ na jātu hi /
XXbsa052_u:2476: sahetukaṃ sarva karmaphalam nāhetukaṃ phalaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ narake tu viśeṣataḥ /
XXbsa052_u:2480: deśānāṃ prati kālaṃ tu yat karma (vi)nivartate /
XXbsa052_u:2481: tasya neṣṭaṃ phalaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ tattvamārgavidarśakaiḥ // Dhs_13.26 //
XXbsa052_u:2482: udāharaṇapradarśanapūrvakaṃ phalasya karmādhīnatvameveti dīpādhīnā prabhā yadvat karmādhīnaṃ phalaṃ tathā /
XXbsa052_u:2483: anyo 'nyaphalasambhūtaḥ saṃskṛtaḥ sarva eva hi // Dhs_13.27 //
XXbsa052_u:2489: sādṛśyaṃ karmaṇā dṛṣṭaṃ viparītaṃ na kalpyate // Dhs_13.30 //
XXbsa052_u:2490: buddhasya svarūpam tatstheṣu karmavaśagāḥ prāṇinaḥ karmahetujāḥ /
XXbsa052_u:2494: (na) teṣāṃ vidyate śāntirādityasya tamo yathā // Dhs_13.32 //
XXbsa052_u:2495: karmāyattaṃ sukham karmāyattaṃ sukhaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ sukhāyattaṃ manastathā /
XXbsa052_u:2497: sucaritasya karmaṇaḥ phalam anityāḥ sarvasaṃskārā jalabud budasannibhāḥ /
XXbsa052_u:2498: tasmāt sucaritaṃ karma loke martya paratra ca // Dhs_13.34 //
XXbsa052_u:2499: dṛṣṭaṃ karmaphalaṃ loke dṛṣṭā eva vicitratā /
XXbsa052_u:2502: baddhā bālā na gacchanti nirvāṇapuramuttamam // Dhs_13.36 //
XXbsa052_u:2506: prayānti nirvṛttiṃ dhanyā yatra jñānyeva vidyate // Dhs_14.1 //
XXbsa052_u:2507: sadṛśaṃ hi phalaṃ hetoḥ kathayanti manīṣiṇaḥ /
XXbsa052_u:2508: hetorasadṛśaṃ naiva phalaṃ pacati dehinām // Dhs_14.2 //
XXbsa052_u:2510: yathā baddhā hi saṃsāre pramucyante (na)dehinaḥ // Dhs_14.3 //
XXbsa052_u:2511: paramaśānterūpāyaḥ tāṃ viśliṣya susambaddhāṃ gāḍhāṃ durviṣehāṃ parām /
XXbsa052_u:2512: gacchanti paramāṃ śānti yatra duḥkhaṃ na vidyate // Dhs_14.4 //
XXbsa052_u:2516: sanmārgadeśiko nāsti yo 'smād duḥkhāt pramocayet // Dhs_14.6 //
XXbsa052_u:2517: ye na dharmaparā nityaṃ ye na satyaparāḥ sadā /
XXbsa052_u:2518: ye ca yoniratā nityaṃ teṣāṃ duḥkhaṃ na hīyate // Dhs_14.7 //
XXbsa052_u:2519: dharma iha paratra ca sukhāvahaḥ mātṛvat pitṛvaccaiva (mitravad) bandhuvat sadā /
XXbsa052_u:2520: dharmo vai deśito buddhairiha loke paratra ca // Dhs_14.8 //
XXbsa052_u:2524: na bhavānmuktigatikāḥ syurbhūmau vicaranti te // Dhs_14.10 //
XXbsa052_u:2527: tridṛṣṭivarjakā ye tu teṣāṃ duḥkhaṃ na vidyate // Dhs_14.11 //
XXbsa052_u:2531: na te vatsyanti saṃsāre vītadoṣā gatajvarāḥ // Dhs_14.13 //
XXbsa052_u:2533: maitrībhāvaviviktā ye te yānti paramāṃ gatim // Dhs_14.14 //
XXbsa052_u:2536: sarvadā dharmavaśagān dhīrān viprān bhajennaraḥ // Dhs_14.15 //
XXbsa052_u:2538: bhāvābhilāṣād viratā muktā niḥsaṃśayaṃ hi te // Dhs_14.16 //
XXbsa052_u:2540: narā nidhanatāṃ yānti prāṇino mohavañcitāḥ // Dhs_14.17 //
XXbsa052_u:2543: naitāni nākabījāni tebhyo rajyenna paṇḍitaḥ // Dhs_14.18 //
XXbsa052_u:2545: naraḥ prapātāt patati sa paścāt pratibudhyate // Dhs_14.19 //
XXbsa052_u:2546: krodherṣyādibhayagrastāḥ svarga na gacchanti krodherṣyāstyānamiddhaṃ hi tvaśraddhaṃ yanmanastathā
XXbsa052_u:2547: mohaśokabhayagrastā na svarga prabhavanti te // Dhs_14.20 //
XXbsa052_u:2550: kudṛṣṭeḥ kuphalam adarśanaṃ paraṃ śreyo na kudṛṣṭiḥ kathañcana /
XXbsa052_u:2551: kudarśanena saṃmūḍhāḥ prayānti narakaṃ narāḥ // Dhs_14.22 //
XXbsa052_u:2553: prayānti narakaṃ tīvraṃ mithyāvādena vañcitāḥ // Dhs_14.23 //
XXbsa052_u:2557: loke prakṛtiduḥkhe 'smin hetubhūtā hi te janāḥ // Dhs_14.25 //
XXbsa052_u:2559: cittatā yā tudatyante sarvataḥ kleśaparvataḥ // Dhs_14.26 //
XXbsa052_u:2560: kleśanāgād vimokṣo yo yasya jñānapuraḥ saraḥ /
XXbsa052_u:2563: na yāti paramāṃ śāntiṃ yatra mithyā na kathyate // Dhs_14.28 //
XXbsa052_u:2565: hetavo narakasyaite śīlasya hi vivarjanam // Dhs_14.29 //
XXbsa052_u:2567: lobhaḥ kūrā matiścaiva hetavo narakasya te // Dhs_14.30 //
XXbsa052_u:2569: cāpalyaṃ manasaścaiva nāśayanti naraṃ sadā // Dhs_14.31 //
XXbsa052_u:2571: na sukhāya bhavantyete asmiṃlloke na cāpare // Dhs_14.32 //
XXbsa052_u:2573: yadyasau bhramati prāyo lokesmin kinna cāpare /
XXbsa052_u:2574: yadyasambhrāmite loke ye ca duḥkhe nimajjati // Dhs_14.33 //
XXbsa052_u:2577: parivarjyāḥ sadā hyete duḥkhavṛkṣasya hetavaḥ // Dhs_14.34 //
XXbsa052_u:2581: doṣasevanaiḥ nāśo bhavati doṣāṇāṃ sevanaṃ dṛṣṭamavidyāsampravartakam /
XXbsa052_u:2582: varjanīyāḥ sadā kleśāḥ sevyaṃ jñānamanuttamam // Dhs_14.36 //
XXbsa052_u:2583: jñānena muktirbhavati jñānena muktirbhavati na ca kleśairihocyate /
XXbsa052_u:2584: jñānāgninā hi dahayante kleśakāṣṭhā na śeṣataḥ // Dhs_14.37 //
XXbsa052_u:2585: kāmamayajñānaṃ kleśajanakam kleśaiḥ kimartha saṃruddhā jālinī viṣa(yai) ratā /
XXbsa052_u:2589: śubhā vāṇī prayoktavyā udīritā śubhā vāṇī niścetavyā prayatnataḥ /
XXbsa052_u:2593: jñānaplavaṃ samāruhya taranti munayaḥ śivāḥ // Dhs_14.41 //
XXbsa052_u:2595: mūḍhā ye bhūtamanaso narāḥ kāmasya sevinaḥ /
XXbsa052_u:2596: sadā ca pañcabhiḥ sthānairmuktisteṣāṃ na vidyate // Dhs_14.42 //
XXbsa052_u:2601: tadalpakāle jātena pradīpena na paśyati // Dhs_14.44 //
XXbsa052_u:2602: jñānalokena trayo doṣāḥ vinaśyanti rāgamūḍhā vipacyante narake mandamedhasaḥ /
XXbsa052_u:2604: trayo do(ṣā) vinaśyanti jñānalokena dehinām // Dhs_14.45 //
XXbsa052_u:2606: amūḍhānāṃ praṇaśyanti trayo doṣāḥ śarīriṇām // Dhs_14.46 //
XXbsa052_u:2609: yatra yāti paraṃ vedaṃ manomohamayaṃ phalam /
XXbsa052_u:2612: trayo vā nirjitā doṣā yairidaṃ dahyate jagat // Dhs_14.49 //
XXbsa052_u:2613: jñānayogena sukhaṃ bhavati tamagniṃ jñānayogena nirvāpya sukhito bhavet /
XXbsa052_u:2619: yo na jānāti mūḍhātmā paścāt sa paritapyate // Dhs_15.1 //
XXbsa052_u:2621: tasmāt pāpaṃ na seveta yadīcchet sukhamātmanaḥ // Dhs_15.2 //
XXbsa052_u:2623: muktyartha (tāni) pāpāni bhūyo mohavaśaṃ gatāḥ // Dhs_15.3 //
XXbsa052_u:2625: alpena vahninā śaile dahayante sarvato drumāḥ // Dhs_15.4 //
XXbsa052_u:2626: nāsti pāpasamo śatruḥ pāpena narakaṃ yāti pāpena paridahyate /
XXbsa052_u:2627: pāpena naiti nirvāṇaṃ nāsti pāpasamo ripuḥ // Dhs_15.5 //
XXbsa052_u:2628: pāpācāro hi puruṣo na kvacit sukhamedhate /
XXbsa052_u:2634: tasmāt pāpaṃ na kurvīta kaṣṭā pāpasya vedanā /
XXbsa052_u:2635: pāpaṃ pāpavipākaṃ ca pāpināṃ pacyate dhruvam // Dhs_15.9 //
XXbsa052_u:2636: na hi pāpaṃ na pāpasya tasmāt pāpaṃ vivarjayet /
XXbsa052_u:2637: parivarjitapāpasya na pāpād bhayamasti hi // Dhs_15.10 //
XXbsa052_u:2638: svakṛtaṃ bādhate pāpaṃ parīkṣyaṃ naiva bhujyate /
XXbsa052_u:2639: kalyāṇasya phalaṃ sādhu kaṣṭaṃ pāpasya pacyate // Dhs_15.11 //
XXbsa052_u:2640: kṛtvā tu puruṣaḥ pāpaṃ kalyāṇaṃ nānusevate /
XXbsa052_u:2641: na śastrāgniprapātebhyo duḥkhaṃ syāt tādṛśaṃ nṛṇām // Dhs_15.12 //
XXbsa052_u:2646: tīvrāt tīvrataraṃ yānti narāḥ kukṛtakāriṇaḥ // Dhs_15.14 //
XXbsa052_u:2648: na hi tīvrasya pāpasya sukhaṃ phalamavāpyate // Dhs_15.15 //
XXbsa052_u:2649: sukhasya vā phala tīvraṃ viparītaṃ na pacyate /
XXbsa052_u:2650: anādimati saṃsāre sukṛtānāṃ phalaṃ sukham // Dhs_15.16 //
XXbsa052_u:2651: karmaṇāṃ sukṛtānāṃ ca tathā duḥkhaphalaṃ smṛtam /
XXbsa052_u:2652: pāpaṃ pāpānugaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ śubhasya ca śubhaṃ tathā // Dhs_15.17 //
XXbsa052_u:2657: tasmāt pāpaṃ vivarjayet ādimadhyāntakaṭukaṃ phalaṃ pāpasya karmaṇaḥ /
XXbsa052_u:2658: tasmāt pāpaṃ sadā varjyamālambyañca śubhaṃ sadā // Dhs_15.20 //
XXbsa052_u:2661: khedaṃ kasmānna gacchanti bālā mohavaśānugāḥ // Dhs_15.21 //
XXbsa052_u:2664: śubhakārī sadā śāntastasmāt pāpaṃ vivarjayet // Dhs_15.22 //
XXbsa052_u:2665: dhīraistattvanidarśakaiḥ pāpavivarjanam aniṣṭamahitaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ vipāke kaṭuvedanam /
XXbsa052_u:2666: pāpaṃ pāpavipākaṃ ca tasmād dhīmān vivarjayet // Dhs_15.23 //
XXbsa052_u:2667: asti pāpaṃ dhruvaṃ pāpe pāpamasti na pātakam /
XXbsa052_u:2671: pāpavirahitāḥ paramaṃ sukhaṃ prāpnuvanti acetanā dhruvaṃ bālā yeṣāṃ duścaritaṃ priyam /
XXbsa052_u:2674: mānuṣyaṃ durlabhaṃ prāpya yasya pāpaṃ priyaṃ bahu // Dhs_15.27 //
XXbsa052_u:2675: śubhāśubhaphalayoḥ pariṇāmabhedaḥ pāpād virajyate yastu śubhe vātīva rajyate /
XXbsa052_u:2676: sa sukhāt sukhamāpnoti nivṛttiṃ vā prayāti hi // Dhs_15.28 //
XXbsa052_u:2678: sa tvadhanyatamo loke yaḥ pāpamupasevate // Dhs_15.29 //
XXbsa052_u:2681: śubhakarmā sukhamāpnoti devalokaṃ ca gacchati atīva śobhate loke śubhakarmā jitendriyaḥ /
XXbsa052_u:2682: kāyasya bhedāt satataṃ devaloke sa jāyate // Dhs_15.31 //
XXbsa052_u:2683: pāpasya pariṇāmaḥ sudāruṇaḥ duṣkṛtasyānubaddhaṃ hi duṣkṛtaṃ phalamucyate sukṛtasya tathā dṛṣṭaṃ phalaṃ sukhavipākajam /
XXbsa052_u:2685: nimittaṃ sadṛśaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ phalaṃ pāpasya karmaṇaḥ /
XXbsa052_u:2688: dina pīḍāpi pāpasya sarvathā duḥkhakārikā // Dhs_15.34 //
XXbsa052_u:2689: amedhyasya yathā gandhaḥ pratikūlo hi dehinām /
XXbsa052_u:2690: śubhasya vāsanā ramyā vipraṇaṣṭasya durgatau // Dhs_15.35 //
XXbsa052_u:2691: vileṣu vāsanaṃ yadvat puṣpe naṣṭe pradṛśyate /
XXbsa052_u:2695: anantā rajanī teṣāṃ (yeṣāṃ) pāpe sthitaṃ manaḥ // Dhs_15.37 //
XXbsa052_u:2696: prabhātaṃ rajanī teṣāṃ yeṣāṃ pāpe sthirā matiḥ /
XXbsa052_u:2698: alpapāpī sukhamāpnute ye na pāpātmano bhūtāste nityaṃ koṭacāriṇaḥ /
XXbsa052_u:2699: alpabhārā yathā nāvā plavate na nimajjati // Dhs_15.39 //
XXbsa052_u:2700: pāpīmitreṇa duḥkhaṃ bhavati tathālpapāpapuruṣaḥ plavate na nimajjati /
XXbsa052_u:2701: na pāpamitrasaṃsargāt puruṣaḥ sukhavān bhavet // Dhs_15.40 //
XXbsa052_u:2703: karmārambha vidhijño yo nityaṃ sūkṣmārtha (darśakaḥ) // Dhs_15.41 //
XXbsa052_u:2704: nāsau limpati pāpena paṅkena gaganaṃ yathā /
XXbsa052_u:2705: aśrutaṃ puruṣaḥ śṛṇvan śrutañcāpi bhaved dṛḍham // Dhs_15.42 //
XXbsa052_u:2706: paṇḍitalakṣaṇam pāpaṃ ca varjayed dhīmān pretya deveṣu jāyate /
XXbsa052_u:2709: guṇeṣu guṇasañcāro doṣeṣu ca tathaiva ca // Dhs_15.44 //
XXbsa052_u:2721: te vayaṃ sukhaduḥkhābhyāṃ bhūyāma bhavasaṅkaṭe // Dhs_15.50 //
XXbsa052_u:2723: kṛtaṃ pāpeṣvamanasaḥ pāpaiḥ rakṣanti ye janāḥ // Dhs_15.51 //
XXbsa052_u:2725: tasmāttu narakānmuktāḥ te gacchanti triviṣṭapam // Dhs_15.52 //
XXbsa052_u:2728: viyogo 'yaṃ parīghāto na ca duḥkhairna vidyate /
XXbsa052_u:2730: tṛṣṇāpāśavaśagaḥ saṃsāre bhramati jano bhramati saṃsāre tṛṣṇāpāśavaśānugaḥ /
XXbsa052_u:2734: sarva duḥkham na ca khedavaśaṃ yānti(hyabhyāsa) vaśamāgatāḥ /
XXbsa052_u:2735: rakṣanti nākabhuvanaṃ virajyante tathā sukhaiḥ // Dhs_15.57 //
XXbsa052_u:2738: (tāni) duḥkhāni bhuṅktāni na ca kliśyanti bāliśāḥ /
XXbsa052_u:2739: na sukhaṃ vidyate loke sarvaduḥkhaiḥ pariplutam // Dhs_15.59 //
XXbsa052_u:2740: duḥkhasya hetuḥ bhavati udvegaṃ naiva gacchanti prāṇino mohapīḍitāḥ /
XXbsa052_u:2741: duḥkhena khidyate bālo duḥkhahetau ca vartate // Dhs_15.60 //
XXbsa052_u:2742: hetau śataphalaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ bījaṃ prati yathā phalaiḥ /
XXbsa052_u:2745: smaryate (hi) yadā duḥkhaṃ tadā vidhyati dehinam // Dhs_15.62 //
XXbsa052_u:2747: nārakaṃ tu sadā duḥkhaṃ smṛtaṃ bhavati dehibhiḥ // Dhs_15.63 //
XXbsa052_u:2749: tadeva viditaṃ matvā jagat sarva samanvitam // Dhs_15.64 //
XXbsa052_u:2753: cittavegaṃ manaḥ sarva jīvitaṃ veti vartate // Dhs_15.66 //
XXbsa052_u:2754: anāgatād duḥkhāt jñānī na bibheti tasmānna jīvikāhetau pāpaṃ kuryādvicakṣaṇaḥ /
XXbsa052_u:2755: anāgatasya duḥkhasya na vibheti mahājanaḥ // Dhs_15.67 //
XXbsa052_u:2758: mūḍhaḥ pāpavaśād narakaṃ gacchati nīyate narakaṃ mūḍho yatra pāpaṃ vipacyate /
XXbsa052_u:2759: yasya pāpād bhayaṃ nāsti sa pāpaṃ kurute bahu // Dhs_15.69 //
XXbsa052_u:2762: pāpavirahitāḥ sukhamicchanti anyairapi tathā pāpairnarakaṃ yāntyabuddhayaḥ /
XXbsa052_u:2766: viṣāgnisadṛśaṃ pāpam viṣāgnisadṛśā hayete tebhyo rakṣet prayatnataḥ /
XXbsa052_u:2767: duḥkhaṃ hi māradharmo 'yaṃ sukhaṃ dharmasamantataḥ // Dhs_15.73 //
XXbsa052_u:2770: satyaṃ dānaṃ tathā kṣāntiḥ sadā cāpāpamitratā /
XXbsa052_u:2775: yā gatiḥ pretya gacchantī tānapāyān (hi me) śṛṇu // Dhs_16.1 //
XXbsa052_u:2776: sañjīvaṃ kāmasūtraṃ ca sampātaṃ dvau ca rauravau /
XXbsa052_u:2780: narakāgnīnāṃ bhayānakatvam catuḥskandhāścaturdvārā vibhaktā bhāgaśo mitāḥ /
XXbsa052_u:2786: narake patitā bhṛśaṃ tapyante ete patanti narake ūrdhvapādā avāṅmukhāḥ /
XXbsa052_u:2788: te punastatra pacyante taptāmbhasi kṛtā iva /
XXbsa052_u:2789: krandamānā divārātrau, nagā vāteritā iva // Dhs_16.8 //
XXbsa052_u:2791: sarvā diśaśca dhāvanti nārakaiḥ puruṣairdrutāḥ // Dhs_16.9 //
XXbsa052_u:2795: tathā baddho 'sti narake mānināṃ ghorakāraṇam // Dhs_16.11 //
XXbsa052_u:2797: te sarve narakaṃ yānti cittairhi parivañcitāḥ // Dhs_16.12 //
XXbsa052_u:2798: kukṛtaphalam yastvayā duṣkṛtaṃ pūrva kṛtaṃ cittānuvartinā /
XXbsa052_u:2803: kiṃ krandasi svayaṃ kṛtvā kukarma puruṣādhama! // Dhs_16.15 //
XXbsa052_u:2804: ye narāḥ kukṛtaṃ kṛtvā pañcatvaṃ yāntyamedhasaḥ /
XXbsa052_u:2805: yeṣāṃ tu niṣphalaṃ janma bījamuptaṃ yathoṣare // Dhs_16.16 //
XXbsa052_u:2807: sevate yastvasau mūḍhaḥ sa yāti tamaso tamaḥ // Dhs_16.17 //
XXbsa052_u:2812: sa yāti narakatvaṃ (ca) pāpaṃ tadanubhūyate // Dhs_16.19 //
XXbsa052_u:2813: na dārā na sutā nārtha na mitrāṇi kathañcana /
XXbsa052_u:2818: kiṃ krandasi svayaṃ kṛtvā kukṛtaṃ mūḍhacetanaḥ // Dhs_16.22 //
XXbsa052_u:2819: na tathāgnirna śastrāṇi na viṣaṃ nārayaḥ sthitāḥ /
XXbsa052_u:2820: bādhate puruṣaṃ loke yathā duṣkṛtyamātmajam // Dhs_16.23 //
XXbsa052_u:2821: pakṣiṇāṃ nīḍavāsavat bhavacakram digbhāge hi yathā gatvā saṃśrayante vanaspatīn /
XXbsa052_u:2824: kiṃ karotyaśubhaṃ karma mohena parivañcitaḥ // Dhs_16.25 //
XXbsa052_u:2825: yena yāti parāṃ śāntiṃ yena yātyasurālayam /
XXbsa052_u:2826: tatra hetuḥ paraṃ mohastamasāmapi yat tamaḥ // Dhs_16.26 //
XXbsa052_u:2827: kuṭumbāya kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ narake pātayati putradāramayaiḥ pāśaiścānītā narakālayam /
XXbsa052_u:2831: nūnamātmā na te kānto babhūva narabhūmiṣu /
XXbsa052_u:2832: yena tvayā kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ putrārthena narādhamaḥ // Dhs_16.29 //
XXbsa052_u:2834: sa yāti narakaṃ ghoraṃ putrakāraṇavañcitaḥ // Dhs_16.30 //
XXbsa052_u:2835: pāpakarmaphalam kiṃ kariṣyanti putrāste kiṃ dārāḥ kiṃ ca bāndhavāḥ /
XXbsa052_u:2840: aghaṃ prayānti te sarve putradārasukhārthinaḥ // Dhs_16.33 //
XXbsa052_u:2843: vaśaṃ prāptāḥ svacittasya sarva eva viḍambitāḥ /
XXbsa052_u:2844: kiṃ krandasi vṛthā nāde vahninā paritāpitaḥ // Dhs_16.35 //
XXbsa052_u:2845: pāpānugaphalaṃ dṛṣṭam atha pāpāni karmāṇi kṛtavānasi manyase /
XXbsa052_u:2846: durmate tatra mā kranda kiṃ vṛthā paridevase // Dhs_16.36 //
XXbsa052_u:2849: kasmānna sevito dharmaḥ pāpañca nahi varjitam /
XXbsa052_u:2850: pāpād bahiśca puruṣo narakaṃ naiva paśyati // Dhs_16.38 //
XXbsa052_u:2851: yo na vindanti mūḍhātmā phalaṃ pāpasya karttṛkam /
XXbsa052_u:2852: so 'vaśyaṃ labhate doṣān kathaṃ bhokṣyasi durmate // Dhs_16.39 //
XXbsa052_u:2854: na kariṣyasi pāpāni tvaduḥkhenaiva yāsyasi // Dhs_16.40 //
XXbsa052_u:2856: pāpena dahyate tasmādaśubhe na manaḥ kṛthāḥ // Dhs_16.41 //
XXbsa052_u:2859: tasmāt pāpaṃ na seveta yadi duḥkhaṃ na vāñchasi // Dhs_16.42 //
XXbsa052_u:2860: kuṭumbijanānāṃ spaṣṭoktiḥ tasyāntarhṛdaye bimbaṃ kintu śāntirna vidyate /
XXbsa052_u:2863: tad vaḥ pradhāvate gāḍhaṃ na ca ye tatra hetavaḥ // Dhs_16.44 //
XXbsa052_u:2864: śīlaṃ na rakṣitaṃ mūḍha pāpaṃ ca bahu sañcitam /
XXbsa052_u:2866: na vayaṃ kāraṇaṃ tatra yūyameva hi kāraṇam /
XXbsa052_u:2867: yaḥ pāpaṃ kurute karma sa hetustasya karmaṇaḥ // Dhs_16.46 //
XXbsa052_u:2869: tad vo prapadyate ghoraṃ kimasmān paribhāṣata // Dhs_16.47 //
XXbsa052_u:2870: nākṛtaṃ pacyate pāpaṃ na pāpaṃ syādahetukam /
XXbsa052_u:2871: yena yaddhi kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ tasya tat paripacyate // Dhs_16.48 //
XXbsa052_u:2872: pāpī narakaṃ yāti tad bhavantaḥ kriyāhīnā madyapānena vañcitāḥ /
XXbsa052_u:2873: patitā narake tīvre kiṃ vṛthā paritapyatha // Dhs_16.49 //
XXbsa052_u:2875: kāraṇeṣvapi tīvreṣu kiṃ tathā paritapyatha // Dhs_16.50 //
XXbsa052_u:2877: tadā kasmānna nikṛṣṭaṃ kimadya paritapyatha // Dhs_16.51 //
XXbsa052_u:2879: heturvai sevitaṃ pūrva niṣphalaṃ paridevatha // Dhs_16.52 //
XXbsa052_u:2881: tasmāt satyaṃ parityajya mṛṣāvādeṣu rajyase // Dhs_16.53 //
XXbsa052_u:2886: pāpakartṛ phalaṃ svayameva bhuṅkte kiṃ krandatha vṛthā mūḍhā vañcitāḥ svena karmaṇā /
XXbsa052_u:2887: muñcitā vañcitā bālā vṛthā krandantyabuddhayaḥ // Dhs_16.56 //
XXbsa052_u:2889: vipralabdho 'si bho martya! gacchannasi mahat tamaḥ // Dhs_16.57 //
XXbsa052_u:2890: nānyaḥ śatruryathā karma duṣkṛtaṃ tava pāpakam /
XXbsa052_u:2893: na dānādiṣu buddhistaiḥ kṛtā (te) mohavañcitā // Dhs_16.59 //
XXbsa052_u:2898: yasya śāntaṃ sadā cittaṃ viṣayairyo na hanyate /
XXbsa052_u:2900: narakasya dhvaniṃ śrutvā kathaṃ krandasi durmate! /
XXbsa052_u:2901: kiṃ punaryatra vahnistvāṃ dhakṣyati śuṣkakāṣṭhavat // Dhs_16.63 //
XXbsa052_u:2902: na dagdhā vahninā ye ca dagdhāste kukṛtaiḥ svakaiḥ /
XXbsa052_u:2903: vahnistu śāmyate kvāpi duṣkṛtāgnirna śāmyati // Dhs_16.64 //
XXbsa052_u:2905: kukṛtāgnimayaṃ pāpaṃ yad dhakṣyati hi tattvataḥ // Dhs_16.65 //
XXbsa052_u:2906: kukṛtāgnividagdhā ye te dagdhā narake narāḥ /
XXbsa052_u:2907: pāpāgnivarjitā ye tu na teṣāṃ narakodayaḥ /
XXbsa052_u:2908: yadyātmanaḥ priyo nityaṃ vibheṣi narakād yadi // Dhs_16.66 //
XXbsa052_u:2909: vivarjaya svapāpāni tato duḥkhaṃ na yāsyasi /
XXbsa052_u:2912: duḥkhaṃ duḥkhavipākaṃ ca duḥkhāntagamanaṃ tathā // Dhs_16.68 //
XXbsa052_u:2914: nātra loke tvayāpāpaṃ yatkṛtaṃ sukṛtaṃ (muhuḥ) // Dhs_16.69 //
XXbsa052_u:2917: hetuḥ kṛto yathā pūrva tathā phalamavāpsyasi /
XXbsa052_u:2918: yathā tava tathānyeṣāṃ prāṇarakṣā prayatnataḥ // Dhs_16.71 //
XXbsa052_u:2922: sarveṣāṃ dayitā dārāḥ prāṇebhyo 'pi garīyasaḥ // Dhs_16.73 //
XXbsa052_u:2929: tasmāt saṃmukṣya mā rodi kiṃ vṛthā paridevase /
XXbsa052_u:2930: viṣayaṃ pāpakā dharmā yasmānnu parivañcitaḥ // Dhs_16.77 //
XXbsa052_u:2932: etat tṛṣṇāgninā sarva pradīptaṃ bhuvanatrayam // Dhs_16.78 //
XXbsa052_u:2933: dharmācaraṇe sāvahitena bhavitavyam dṛṣṭvā nācarito dharmaḥ kimadya paritapyase /
XXbsa052_u:2934: (śrutvā) te madhuraṃ cittaṃ kāmamandirakaṃ vacaḥ // Dhs_16.79 //
XXbsa052_u:2936: sa kṛtvā pāpakaṃ karma niyatā pāpavedanā // Dhs_16.80 //
XXbsa052_u:2940: aniṣṭaṃ pāpakaṃ karma kṛtvā rogavaśe sthitāḥ // Dhs_16.82 //
XXbsa052_u:2942: paridevati yo mūḍho vṛthā sa paridevati /
XXbsa052_u:2945: mayā kṛtāni karmāṇi phaladāni mamaiva hi // Dhs_16.84 //
XXbsa052_u:2949: durācāraratānāṃ tu nṛṇāmasya phalaṃ kaṭu // Dhs_16.86 //
XXbsa052_u:2954: duḥkhād duḥkhataraṃ karma mayedaṃ paripacyate // Dhs_16.88 //
XXbsa052_u:2955: sukhāvāptiṃ na paśyāmi kṣemaṃ vā narakasya me /
XXbsa052_u:2956: jīvalokādahaṃ bhraṣṭo abuddha iva mārgataḥ // Dhs_16.89 //
XXbsa052_u:2963: trātāraṃ nāvagacchāmi yo 'smād duḥkhāt pramocayet // Dhs_16.92 //
XXbsa052_u:2966: na vārthā nāpi mitrāṇi na putrā na ca yoṣitaḥ /
XXbsa052_u:2967: trāyante vyasanādasmāt kṛtaghnā bata te mama // Dhs_16.94 //
XXbsa052_u:2968: adharmacāriṇo na kvāpi śaraṇam nirānandasya na sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ (gṛhṇāmi sarvaśaḥ) /
XXbsa052_u:2970: saṃkruddhā iva te, krūrā bhaviṣyanti samantataḥ /
XXbsa052_u:2971: nirānandā diśaḥ sarvā vyālaiśca parivāritā // Dhs_16.96 //
XXbsa052_u:2973: yacca yaccehaṃ paśyāmi jaṅgamaṃ sthāvaraṃ tathā /
XXbsa052_u:2974: tat sarva vyākulaṃ caiva vahninā paridīpitam // Dhs_16.97 //
XXbsa052_u:2976: ghore tamasi majjāsi sāgare ca hṛtaplavaḥ // Dhs_16.98 //
XXbsa052_u:2980: krakacaistu tadā sarva śarīraṃ paripāṭayate // Dhs_16.100 //
XXbsa052_u:2985: samīkṣya karmajaṃ nityaṃ dhyeyo hetuḥ punaḥ punaḥ /
XXbsa052_u:2987: yat pūrva karaṇīyaṃ te tatpaścāt paricintyase /
XXbsa052_u:2989: kiṃ punaḥ pāpakartturyaḥ kaṭukaṃ paripacyate // Dhs_16.104 //
XXbsa052_u:2991: trāṇaṃ naiva (ca) yatrāsti vinā karmaparikṣayāt // Dhs_16.105 //
XXbsa052_u:2995: pacyate yatra vivaśā nārakeyā hyanekaśaḥ // Dhs_16.107 //
XXbsa052_u:2998: paiśunyasevino narakaṃ yānti bhasmībhavanti te nityaṃ mitrasvajanabāndhavaiḥ /
XXbsa052_u:3000: tasmānna carito dharmaḥ paiśunyaṃ ca na varjitam /
XXbsa052_u:3001: paiśunyaṃ saphalaṃ bhuktvā kimadya paritapyase // Dhs_16.110 //
XXbsa052_u:3008: paruṣavāco narakasya cāntaram yadantaraṃ himāgnyorhi merusarṣapayośca yat /
XXbsa052_u:3009: tadantaraṃ jihvayoktyā narake jvalanasya ca // Dhs_16.114 //
XXbsa052_u:3013: na tathā sa prabhavati yathā vahnistadudbhavaḥ // Dhs_16.116 //
XXbsa052_u:3016: pareṣāṃ sampadaṃ dṛṣṭvā mama syāditi cintitam /
XXbsa052_u:3019: dahanād dahanaṃ prāpto tapyase ca vikatthyase // Dhs_16.119 //
XXbsa052_u:3024: adharmakathanaṃ dahatyeva adharmo dharmarūpeṇa sādhurūpeṇa pāpakam /
XXbsa052_u:3025: yat tvayā kathitaṃ pūrva tat tvāṃ dahati nānalaḥ // Dhs_16.122 //
XXbsa052_u:3027: deśitaṃ vivaraṃ pāpaṃ niyataṃ pāpagāmikam // Dhs_16.123 //
XXbsa052_u:3031: yataḥ sadharmavinayaiḥ kiṃ tathā paridevase // Dhs_16.125 //
XXbsa052_u:3033: ki tapyase rodiṣi ca karma kṛtvā sudāruṇam // Dhs_16.126 //
XXbsa052_u:3035: prāpto 'si narakaṃ ghoraṃ nārakāgraṃ sudāruṇam // Dhs_16.127 //
XXbsa052_u:3036: kāmavaśānugā narakaṃ yānti kāmaiḥ kramati saṃyuktairyanna bhavati ceṣṭitam /
XXbsa052_u:3039: sukṛta narakaṃ yānti devāḥ kāmavaśānugāḥ // Dhs_16.129 //
XXbsa052_u:3040: āryāpavādakā narakaṃ yānti āryāpavādakā ye ca ye ca karmaphaladviṣaḥ /
XXbsa052_u:3041: te mṛtvā narakaṃ yānti ye ca mithyāvinītakāḥ // Dhs_16.130 //
XXbsa052_u:3042: dharmavañcakā eva narakagāminaḥ jananīgṛhapāpīyā ye cānye dharmavañcakāḥ /
XXbsa052_u:3043: teṣāmiṣṭakarā loke narakasya ca gāminaḥ // Dhs_16.131 //
XXbsa052_u:3044: pāparatā duḥkhamanubhavanti ye cānye sukhasaṃsaktā nityaṃ pāparatā narāḥ /
XXbsa052_u:3045: duḥkhād duḥkhaṃ tu te yānti cittena parivañcitāḥ // Dhs_16.132 //
XXbsa052_u:3046: avadyakāryāṇi narake pātayanti tasmādavadyakārye na matiṃ (kuryāt kathañcana) /
XXbsa052_u:3055: adīpikā prabhā nāsti adānasya kutaḥ sukham // Dhs_17.1 //
XXbsa052_u:3057: dānena virahāt tadvat sukhaṃ pretairna labhyate // Dhs_17.2 //
XXbsa052_u:3058: kukarmī pretalokaṃ gacchati yaṃ pretya pretalokasya triloke ca yathādhamāḥ /
XXbsa052_u:3060: na dātrā labhyate kiñcit kṛtanāśo na vidyate /
XXbsa052_u:3065: paridāhāt kadā cāsmāt parimokṣo bhaviṣyati // Dhs_17.6 //
XXbsa052_u:3066: mārgāmārgavihīno duḥkhita eva jīvati mārgāmārgavivikto 'haṃ na jñātaṃ karmaṇaḥ phalam /
XXbsa052_u:3069: tvaksnāyujālabaddhāḥ sma jīvāmo bata duḥkhitāḥ // Dhs_17.8 //
XXbsa052_u:3070: na trātā sarvato 'smākaṃ hanta kṛcchragatā vayam /
XXbsa052_u:3071: utpanneṣu manuṣyeṣu khaṇḍitāḥ svena karmaṇā // Dhs_17.9 //
XXbsa052_u:3073: yaḥ karoti śubhaṃ nityamaśubhaṃ na ca sarvadā // Dhs_17.10 //
XXbsa052_u:3075: yeṣāmarthe kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ kleśayan mānasaṃ bahu // Dhs_17.11 //
XXbsa052_u:3076: anena te gatāḥ sarve bhavānāṃ trāsane sthitaḥ /

XXbsa052_u:4191: dharme eva manaḥ kāryam yāvannābhyeti maraṇaṃ yāvat sakalacintanam /
XXbsa052_u:4193: paropakartṛ nirvāṇapuraṃ yāti yo hi deśayate dharma pareṣāṃ hitakāṅkṣayā /
XXbsa052_u:4194: sa mātā sa pitā caiva nirvāṇapuradeśakaḥ // Dhs_31.17 //
XXbsa052_u:4195: śāstuḥ subhāṣitamamūlyam śubhādhikaparaścaikaḥ yo deśayati deśikaḥ /
XXbsa052_u:4197: na mūlyaṃ vidyate śāstuḥ subhāṣitapadasya vai // Dhs_31.18 //
XXbsa052_u:4198: sādhāraṇadravyād dharmadravyasya vailakṣaṇyam na padaṃ labhate śāntaṃ yad dhanairupalabhyate
XXbsa052_u:4199: dravyaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ na dharmo buddhibandhanam // Dhs_31.19 //
XXbsa052_u:4200: dharmadravyamakṣuṇṇamasti dravyaṃ vinaśyati nṛṇāṃ dharmadravyaṃ na jātu vai /
XXbsa052_u:4205: ato dharmaparo bhavet acireṇāpi kālena bhuktvā saukhyamanekaśaḥ /
XXbsa052_u:4206: bhavatyavaśyaṃ patanaṃ tasmād dharmaparo bhavet // Dhs_31.22 //
XXbsa052_u:4207: dharma ekaḥ paraṃ trāṇaṃ dharma ekaḥ parā gatiḥ /
XXbsa052_u:4209: dharmacāriṇaḥ praśaṃsā varaṃ dharmo dharmacārī dharmameva niṣevate /
XXbsa052_u:4210: sa sukhāt sukhamāpnoti na duḥkhamanupaśyati // Dhs_31.24 //
XXbsa052_u:4211: adharmacāriṇo nindā adharmacārī puruṣo yadādharma niṣevate /
XXbsa052_u:4212: sa tadā duḥkhamāpnoti narakeṣu punaḥ punaḥ // Dhs_31.25 //
XXbsa052_u:4215: ātmanaiva puṇyamācaraṇīyam ātmanā kriyate puṇyamātmanā pratipadyate /
XXbsa052_u:4216: sukhaṃ vā yadi vā duḥkhamātmanaivopabhujyate // Dhs_31.27 //
XXbsa052_u:4217: śīlavataḥ puṇyaprabhāvo vipulaḥ nadīstrota ivājastraṃ puruṣasya pravartate /
XXbsa052_u:4218: puṇyaprabhāvo vipulo yasya śīle rataṃ manaḥ // Dhs_31.28 //
XXbsa052_u:4219: bhavajanyaṃ phalaṃ yasya (yasmai) dharmo na rocate /
XXbsa052_u:4220: dharmo hi nayati svarga dharmacārī sukhānvitaḥ // Dhs_31.29 //
XXbsa052_u:4221: dharmādṛte puruṣaḥ narakaṃ yāti etadeva hi paryāptaṃ yad dharmaparipālanam /
XXbsa052_u:4223: dharmavigarhaṇānmaraṇaṃ śreyaḥ śreyo bhaveddhi maraṇaṃ na tu dharmavigarhaṇam /
XXbsa052_u:4224: dharmeṇa varjito lokaḥ saṃsāre sarvadā bhramet // Dhs_31.31 //
XXbsa052_u:4226: vṛthā saukhyamidaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ dṛṣṭvā yāto yathāparaḥ // Dhs_31.32 //
XXbsa052_u:4230: prayānti tat padaṃ śāntaṃ yatra duḥkhaṃ na vidyate // Dhs_31.34 //
XXbsa052_u:4231: indriyavaśī māraṃ nātivartate indriyāṇāṃ vaśe yastu viṣayeṣu tathaiva ca /
XXbsa052_u:4232: sa sarvabandhanairbaddhaḥ sa māraṃ nātivartate // Dhs_31.35 //
XXbsa052_u:4233: pāpakairdharmairalipta eva svasthaḥ aliptapāpakairdharmaiḥ nirdhanāt kanakadyutiḥ /
XXbsa052_u:4234: sa muktabhavakāntāraḥ svastho bhavati sarvataḥ // Dhs_31.36 //
XXbsa052_u:4235: buddhādīnāṃ pūjayā nirvāṇalābhaḥ buddho yeṣāṃ bahumato nityaṃ dharmaśca gocaraḥ /
XXbsa052_u:4241: dharmadānaṃ sarvottamam dānānāmuttamaṃ dānaṃ dharmadānaṃ prakathyate /
XXbsa052_u:4242: udyogānāṃ sadā dhyānaṃ yena gacchati nirvṛtim // Dhs_31.40 //
XXbsa052_u:4246: kṣetrāṇāṃ trividhaṃ puṇyaṃ guṇaduḥkhobhayaṃ tataḥ // Dhs_31.42 //
XXbsa052_u:4247: mātā pitṛsamaḥ pūjya upādhyāyaḥ sadā bhavet /
XXbsa052_u:4249: niḥsukhā viṣayā matāḥ agrāhyā vā sadā dṛṣṭā muninā tattvadarśinā /
XXbsa052_u:4250: sukhasya bhūmayo hyetā niḥsukhā viṣayā matāḥ // Dhs_31.44 //
XXbsa052_u:4252: saukhyaṃ tasya bhavennityaṃ na saukhyaṃ devabhūmiṣu // Dhs_31.45 //
XXbsa052_u:4254: sa āhūya prayatnena sevitavyaḥ sadā naraiḥ // Dhs_31.46 //
XXbsa052_u:4255: anāgate bhayaṃ yo hi paśyati buddhacakṣuṣā /
XXbsa052_u:4256: sa paṇḍitaḥ sadā dhīro mūrkhatvādatibhīrukaḥ // Dhs_31.47 //
XXbsa052_u:4258: sa hi vighne tu samprāpte na viṣādena bādhyate // Dhs_31.48 //
XXbsa052_u:4260: vimohitaḥ sa viṣayaiḥ paścāttāpena dahyate // Dhs_31.49 //
XXbsa052_u:4261: samagraṃ janma puṇyāni karaṇīyāni yāvat samagraṃ janmedaṃ jñānaṃ yāti vināvilam /
XXbsa052_u:4262: tāvat kuruta puṇyāni duḥkhaṃ hayakṛtapuṇyatā // Dhs_31.50 //
XXbsa052_u:4263: kṣayaṃ prayānti puṇyāni tvaritaṃ yāti jīvitam /
XXbsa052_u:4265: yo hi dharma parityajya pramādopahato naraḥ /
XXbsa052_u:4266: na sañcinoti puṇyāni sa paścādapi tapyate // Dhs_31.52 //
XXbsa052_u:4267: na yāvadāyāti jarā na vyādhiḥ saha mṛtyunā /
XXbsa052_u:4268: tāvat kāryāṇi puṇyāni mā paścāt paritapyatha // Dhs_31.53 //
XXbsa052_u:4270: narake kāraṇaṃ duḥkhaṃ pramādastvāṃ haniṣyati // Dhs_31.54 //
XXbsa052_u:4271: kiṃ tasya jīvitenārthaḥ kiṃ bhāgyaiḥ kiṃ ca bāndhavaiḥ /
XXbsa052_u:4272: sabalendriyatāṃ prāpya yo na dharmarataḥ sadā // Dhs_31.55 //
XXbsa052_u:4274: viratiścāpi pāpebhyaḥ sādhūnāṃ darśane na ca // Dhs_31.56 //
XXbsa052_u:4275: śīlena yaḥ suro janma labdhvedaṃ kāmamohitaḥ /
XXbsa052_u:4276: na sañcinoti puṇyāni sa bhavaṃ nātivartate // Dhs_31.57 //
XXbsa052_u:4278: kāmarāgāddhi ye bhītā devānāṃ devasammatāḥ // Dhs_31.58 //
XXbsa052_u:4279: devāste hi sadā vandyā ye dharme niratāḥ sadā /
XXbsa052_u:4280: ye tu nityaṃ bhavāsaktāste sarve nidhanaṃ gatāḥ // Dhs_31.59 //
XXbsa052_u:4282: na sañcarati yastūrṇa bhavānnaiva pramucyate // Dhs_31.60 //
XXbsa052_u:4283: śubhaṃ naiva praṇaśyati śubhānucāridharmaiśca śubhaṃ bhavati sarvadā /
XXbsa052_u:4285: puṇyaprāptyarthe karaṇīyāni karttavyāni saṅgṛhītaṃ sadā śīlaṃ jñānaṃ ca parivartitam /
XXbsa052_u:4286: dānaṃ cābhikṣayā dattaṃ bhavati svarasātmakam // Dhs_31.62 //
XXbsa052_u:4287: sadaiva guṇāḥ sevyāḥ doṣāstrayaḥ praṇaśyanti tribhirdānādibhirnṛṇām /
XXbsa052_u:4288: tasmād doṣān parityajya guṇāḥ sevyāḥ prayatnataḥ // Dhs_31.63 //
XXbsa052_u:4289: jñānena laukikaṃ duḥkhaṃ naśyati saṃsargo dharmaśīlānāṃ jñānārambhaḥ prayatnataḥ /
XXbsa052_u:4292: prāpya janmāntara cāpi nirvṛtiṃ cāśu gacchati // Dhs_31.65 //
XXbsa052_u:4295: panthāno muninā śāstre uktā ye tattvadarśinā /
XXbsa052_u:4297: sugatokto mārgaḥ satyaṃ hi dānaṃ ca tathaiva maitrī sattveṣu rakṣā priyavāditā ca /
XXbsa052_u:4303: ācāravān devānāmantikaṃ vrajet yasya śuddhaṃ sadā cittaṃ nirmalaṃ maṇivat sadā /
XXbsa052_u:4304: sa śānto nirmamo dhīmān devānāmantikaṃ vrajet // Dhs_32.5 //
XXbsa052_u:4306: sa dhīmān kāñcanaprakhyo devānāmantikaṃ vrajet // Dhs_32.6 //
XXbsa052_u:4311: tṛṇavat kāñcanaṃ yasya kāmā yasya viṣopamāḥ /
XXbsa052_u:4312: sa kāmavarjako dhīmān devānāmantikaṃ vrajet // Dhs_32.9 //
XXbsa052_u:4316: yaḥ karoti susaṃśliṣṭā devānāmantikaṃ vrajet // Dhs_32.11 //
XXbsa052_u:4317: yasya buddhisthitaṃ veśma na buddhiḥ kvāpi rāgiṇī /
XXbsa052_u:4320: sa kāmavirato dhyāyī devānāmantikaṃ vrajet // Dhs_32.13 //
XXbsa052_u:4322: na baddhaḥ strībhayaiḥ pāśairdevānāmantikaṃ vrajet // Dhs_32.14 //
XXbsa052_u:4327: śubhakarmavipākena devaloke udbhavaḥ manuṣyabhūtā ye sattvāścaranti sukṛtāvahāḥ /
XXbsa052_u:4329: dharmapathāśritā eva balinaḥ manuṣyāṇāṃ balād devā devānāṃ balino narāḥ /
XXbsa052_u:4334: sarva sukhaṃ dharmādhīnam dharmādhīnaṃ sukhaṃ sarva dharmādhīnā hi nirvṛtiḥ /
XXbsa052_u:4335: dharmaḥ supteṣu jāgarti dharmo hi paramā gatiḥ // Dhs_32.20 //
XXbsa052_u:4336: devairasurā jitāḥ dharmeṇa nirjito 'dharmaḥ satyenānṛtiko jitaḥ /
XXbsa052_u:4337: jñānena varjito moho devaistu hyasurā jitāḥ // Dhs_32.21 //
XXbsa052_u:4338: devalokaṃ sukhodayam sopānabhūtā ye tāni karmāṇi tridivasya hi /
XXbsa052_u:4339: yoniṃ tyaktvā narā yānti devalokaṃ sukhodayam // Dhs_32.22 //
XXbsa052_u:4340: vāksaṃyamena budhāstridivaṃ sukhaṃ bhuñjanti caturvidho vāṅniyamaḥ ko 'pi trividhapañcadhā
XXbsa052_u:4342: prabhayā te ca divyantaḥ svaśarīreṇa jātayā /
XXbsa052_u:4343: ramante svargabhuvane rañjitāḥ svena karmaṇā // Dhs_32.24 //
XXbsa052_u:4346: yad devā devabhavane śīlaṃ tatra hi kāraṇam // Dhs_32.25 //
XXbsa052_u:4349: yadīpsitaṃ sambhavati sambhūtaṃ ca na hīyate /
XXbsa052_u:4350: vartate ca śubhaṃ nityaṃ tat sarva śubhahetukam // Dhs_32.27 //
XXbsa052_u:4351: śubhacārī devānāṃ samatāṃ vrajet śubhacārī sadā dānī sarvabhūtadayārataḥ /
XXbsa052_u:4352: dānamaitryā sadā yukto devānāṃ samatāṃ vrajet // Dhs_32.28 //
XXbsa052_u:4355: adatte na ratiḥ kiñcid dāne cāsya sadāmatiḥ /
XXbsa052_u:4359: vimanaskaṃ hi yat prīte puruṣe kurute laghu /
XXbsa052_u:4360: madyavarjī paraṃ dhīro devānāmantikaṃ vrajet // Dhs_32.32 //
XXbsa052_u:4361: pramādavirahitaḥ sukhamāpnoti sukha (prāṇo) hi yo devaḥ pramādaṃ nānusevate /
XXbsa052_u:4368: atīva saukhyaṃ labhate kasmād deveṣu sarvadā // Dhs_32.36 //
XXbsa052_u:4373: etadagryaṃ tribhūmiṣṭhaṃ (triguṇaṃ ca) phalaṃ mahat // Dhs_32.38 //
XXbsa052_u:4377: yad devā divyamatayaḥ (kurvanti) śubhameva tat // Dhs_32.40 //
XXbsa052_u:4379: nyūnamadhyaṃ tu yasyaitat phalaṃ puṇyasya dṛśyate // Dhs_32.41 //
XXbsa052_u:4380: puṇyakartā devalokaṃ gacchati yena yāvaddhi yat puṇyaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavati dehinā /
XXbsa052_u:4381: tasya tāvaddhi tat saukhyaṃ devalokeṣu pacyate // Dhs_32.42 //
XXbsa052_u:4382: śīlasaṃrakṣaṇamāvaśyakam svāgataṃ tava bho bhadra! sukṛtaṃ kṛtavānasi /
XXbsa052_u:4383: saptadhā rakṣitaṃ śīlaṃ tasyaitat phalamāgatam // Dhs_32.43 //
XXbsa052_u:4384: ramasva saha daivataiḥ vanopavanaśaileṣu padmākaravaneṣu ca /
XXbsa052_u:4387: vanādriṣu ca naikeṣu ramasva saha daivataiḥ // Dhs_32.45 //
XXbsa052_u:4389: saritsu ca viśālāsu (ramasva) saha daivataiḥ // Dhs_32.46 //
XXbsa052_u:4391: nagareṣu mahārtheṣu ramasva saha daivataiḥ // Dhs_32.47 //
XXbsa052_u:4393: yakṣasadmasu ramyeṣu ramasva saha daivataiḥ // Dhs_32.48 //
XXbsa052_u:4395: vimāneṣu ca ramyeṣu ramasva saha daivataiḥ // Dhs_32.49 //
XXbsa052_u:4397: nṛtyamānaḥ sukhī nityaṃ ramasva saha daivataiḥ // Dhs_32.50 //
XXbsa052_u:4401: tacchubhasya phalaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ nirmalasya viśeṣataḥ // Dhs_32.52 //
XXbsa052_u:4403: na vayaṃ hetavastatra (tatra hetuḥ) purākṛtam // Dhs_32.53 //
XXbsa052_u:4410: sukṛtaphalam uparyupari saukhyāni (tathā ca) sukṛtasya vai /
XXbsa052_u:4411: bhuñjanti vibudhāḥ svarga yaddhi pūrvakṛtānugam // Dhs_32.57 //
XXbsa052_u:4414: bhāgyaṃ phalati sarvatra yena yena vipākena yatra yatropapadyate /
XXbsa052_u:4415: puruṣo labhate svasya prārabdhasya śubhāśubham // Dhs_32.59 //
XXbsa052_u:4416: śubhakarmaṇā prāṇī nityaṃ deveṣu jāyate śubhena karmaṇā janturnityaṃ deveṣu jāyate /
XXbsa052_u:4418: kāmino maraṇaṃ nāvagacchanti śubhāśubhābhyāṃ saṃraktāḥ kāminaḥ kāmamohitāḥ /
XXbsa052_u:4421: na saukhyād viramantyete manaḥ saukhyena mohitāḥ // Dhs_32.62 //
XXbsa052_u:4422: sukṛtaṃ kṛtvā mānavāḥ deveṣu yānti trividhaṃ sukṛtaṃ kṛtvā bhāvayitvā ca saptadhā /
XXbsa052_u:4423: trisaṃkhyākān ripūn hatvā yānti deveṣu mānavāḥ // Dhs_32.63 //
XXbsa052_u:4426: sa nandyasūyakaḥ śuddho devānāmantikaṃ gataḥ // Dhs_32.64 //
XXbsa052_u:4428: samaṃ ca trividhaṃ dattvā devānāmantikaṃ gataḥ // Dhs_32.65 //
XXbsa052_u:4430: maitracittaḥ sadā dānto devānāmantikaṃ gataḥ // Dhs_32.66 //
XXbsa052_u:4431: adattaṃ ca dhanaṃ dattvā dattvānandaṃ ca sarvataḥ /
XXbsa052_u:4436: kathyate sa mṛṣāvādastaṃ hitvā sugatiṃ vrajet // Dhs_32.69 //
XXbsa052_u:4437: paiśūnyaṃ ca sadā hitvā maitryanarthakaraṃ padam /
XXbsa052_u:4441: adharmo yasya jihvāgre na bhūto na bhaviṣyati /
XXbsa052_u:4444: sa dhīraḥ śīlatattvajño devānāmantikaṃ vrajet // Dhs_32.73 //
XXbsa052_u:4447: tatprāpya yo na dharmajñaḥ sa paścāt paritapyate // Dhs_32.74 //
XXbsa052_u:4449: yadvicitramayo lokastat sarva śubhajaṃ phalam // Dhs_32.75 //
XXbsa052_u:4450: yena yena yathā karma kṛtaṃ bhavati śobhanam /
XXbsa052_u:4451: tasya tasya tathā dṛṣṭaṃ phalaṃ tadanugāmikam // Dhs_32.76 //
XXbsa052_u:4453: yena yena yathā cīrṇaṃ tasya tasya tathā phalam // Dhs_32.77 //
XXbsa052_u:4454: kukarmaṇā duḥkhajaṃ phalam vicitraveṣāḥ saṃmūḍhā devā mohavaśānugāḥ /
XXbsa052_u:4455: tannāśānmanasā mūḍhā na paśyanti mahadbhayam // Dhs_32.78 //
XXbsa052_u:4457: na vā kurvanti karmāṇi te 'surā mūḍhacetasaḥ // Dhs_32.79 //
XXbsa052_u:4459: phalaṃ yeṣāṃ priyaṃ cittaṃ na ca śīle ratā matiḥ /
XXbsa052_u:4461: hetuphalatattvajñāḥ sukhino bhavanti ye hetuphalasādṛśyenecchanti surasattamān /
XXbsa052_u:4463: jñānādeva muktiḥ vinābījaṃ phalaṃ nāsti vinā dīpaṃ kutaḥ prabhā? /
XXbsa052_u:4464: vinā śīlaiḥ kutaḥ svargo muktirjñānaṃ vinā kutaḥ? // Dhs_32.82 //
XXbsa052_u:4468: sukarmaiḥ sukhaṃ bhavatyeva yadidaṃ karmajaṃ saukhyaṃ sarva (tajjñeya) kalmaṣam /
XXbsa052_u:4469: yaṃ neṣṭakaṃ bhavatyeva tat sarvamamalaṃ smṛtam // Dhs_32.84 //
XXbsa052_u:4482: yaṃ samāśritya krīḍanti devavṛndāni sarvataḥ // Dhs_32.90 //
XXbsa052_u:4485: ye bhavanti sadā dāntāste janāḥsvargagāminaḥ // Dhs_32.91 //
XXbsa052_u:4487: vairiṇāṃ viṣayo nityaṃ praśāntamanasastu ye // Dhs_32.92 //
XXbsa052_u:4493: saṃsāre ye na rakṣanti svamano (nanu) dehinaḥ /
XXbsa052_u:4494: nirvāṇābhiratā nityaṃ te janāḥ svargagāminaḥ // Dhs_32.95 //
XXbsa052_u:4495: vṛkṣamūle śmaśāne vā tathā ca girikandare /
XXbsa052_u:4498: maitreṇa cetasā ye tu te janāḥ svargagāminaḥ // Dhs_32.97 //
XXbsa052_u:4502: kāryākāryavidhijñā ye te janāḥ svargagāminaḥ // Dhs_32.99 //
XXbsa052_u:4503: dharmāṇāṃ dharmatāṃ ye ca paśyanti vividhā samāḥ /
XXbsa052_u:4504: na ca rakṣanti saṃsāre te janāḥ svargagāminaḥ // Dhs_32.100 //
XXbsa052_u:4506: paśyanti ca na rakṣanti te janāḥ svargagāminaḥ // Dhs_32.101 //
XXbsa052_u:4508: ye jānanti (sadā) cittāḥ te janāḥ svargagāminaḥ // Dhs_32.102 //
XXbsa052_u:4512: paśyanti ye bhayaṃ loke te janāḥ svargagāminaḥ // Dhs_32.104 //
XXbsa052_u:4516: saṃtuṣṭāḥ svena cittena te janāḥ svargagāminaḥ // Dhs_32.106 //
XXbsa052_u:4517: na rātrau na divā yeṣāṃ kausīdyadyutiriṣyate /
XXbsa052_u:4518: nityodyuktavihārā ye te janāḥ svargagāminaḥ // Dhs_32.107 //
XXbsa052_u:4519: kaukṛtyaṃ styānamiddhaṃ ca kausīdyaṃ ca viśeṣataḥ /
XXbsa052_u:4520: varjayanti sadā dhanyāste janāḥ svargagāminaḥ // Dhs_32.108 //
XXbsa052_u:4522: saṃkṣipanti sadā duḥkhaṃ te janāḥ svargagāminaḥ // Dhs_32.109 //
XXbsa052_u:4524: ye paśyanti budhāḥ prajñāṃ te janāḥ svargagāminaḥ // Dhs_32.110 //
XXbsa052_u:4525: duḥkhaṃ duḥkhavipākaśca duḥkheṣu ca manaśca yat /
XXbsa052_u:4526: paśyanti ye sadā tattvaṃ te janāḥ svargagāminaḥ // Dhs_32.111 //
XXbsa052_u:4529: śuklāvadātaṃ ye vastraṃ pāṃsukūlaṃ tathaiva ca /
XXbsa052_u:4530: piṇḍapātaratā nityaṃ te janāḥ svargagāminaḥ // Dhs_32.113 //
XXbsa052_u:4532: naiṣkarmyaniratāḥ sarve te janāḥ svargagāminaḥ // Dhs_32.114 //
XXbsa052_u:4534: santuṣyanti na kupyanti te janāḥ svargagāminaḥ // Dhs_32.115 //
XXbsa052_u:4535: śuklāvadātaṃ ye vastraṃ pāṃsukūlaṃ tathaiva ca /
XXbsa052_u:4536: saṃvṛtau caiva saṃtuṣṭāste janāḥ svargagāminaḥ // Dhs_32.116 //
XXbsa052_u:4537: śayyātale yathā bhūmau harmyāgre vā tathāpare /
XXbsa052_u:4538: na duṣyanti (na hṛṣyanti) te janāḥ svargagāminaḥ // Dhs_32.117 //
XXbsa052_u:4540: tattvato ye prapaśyanti te janāḥ svargagāminaḥ // Dhs_32.118 //
XXbsa052_u:4541: apriyaṃ vā priyaṃ vāpi ye śrutvā tīvrasambhramāt /
XXbsa052_u:4544: saṃkṣipanti na rakṣanti te janāḥ svargagāminaḥ // Dhs_32.120 //
XXbsa052_u:4547: karmaṇāṃ ca vipākaṃ ca kṛtaṃ (ye dhīracetasā) /
XXbsa052_u:4548: bibhyatīha sadā duḥkhete janāḥ svargagāminaḥ // Dhs_32.122 //
XXbsa052_u:4550: kurvanti vidhivat sarva te janāḥ svargagāminaḥ // Dhs_32.123 //
XXbsa052_u:4554: teṣāṃ sukhaṃ yathāvat syāt nirvāṇapuradarśakam // Dhs_33.1 //
XXbsa052_u:4557: dhū(ma) miśraṃ yathā kāṣṭhaṃ vi(ṣṭhā) miśraṃ yathodanam /
XXbsa052_u:4559: nirvāṇapuragāmināṃ sukham tat sukhaṃ yad vitṛṣṇānāmekāntasukhacāriṇām /
XXbsa052_u:4562: yeṣāṃ tṛṣṇānugā cāśā sarvathā naiva cetasi // Dhs_33.5 //
XXbsa052_u:4567: sa dhīraḥ pāragaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ sukhī nirvāṇamāśritaḥ // Dhs_33.7 //
XXbsa052_u:4569: yatra rāgādinirmuktaṃ tat sukhaṃ nirmalaṃ matam // Dhs_33.8 //
XXbsa052_u:4572: sa sukhāt sukhatāṃ yāti yatra tṛṣṇā na bādhate // Dhs_33.9 //
XXbsa052_u:4574: mṛtyupāśairna baddhasya na sukhaṃ vidyate kvacit /
XXbsa052_u:4575: yat sukhaṃ kāmajanakaṃ na tat saukhyaṃ satāṃ matam // Dhs_33.10 //
XXbsa052_u:4577: yat sukhaṃ janayet śreyaḥ (payomiśraṃ) yathodanam // Dhs_33.11 //
XXbsa052_u:4579: yathā padmavane gṛddhā yānti(te) kravyabhakṣiṇaḥ // Dhs_33.12 //
XXbsa052_u:4581: kvacicchāntaṃ vanaṃ ramyaṃ kvacid devāḥ pramādinaḥ // Dhs_33.13 //
XXbsa052_u:4583: viparītaṃ na sadṛśaṃ bhānoḥ śītā yathā prabhā /
XXbsa052_u:4584: gatatṛṣṇasya yat saukhyaṃ muktaduḥkhasya tāyinaḥ // Dhs_33.14 //
XXbsa052_u:4587: tat sukhaṃ tat paraṃ saukhyaṃ nedaṃ tṛṣṇāvidāṃ matam /
XXbsa052_u:4588: munisevyaṃ vanamidaṃ sevitaṃ ca subhāṣitaiḥ // Dhs_33.16 //
XXbsa052_u:4590: yadetad bhavatāṃ saukhyametanna khalu śāśvatam // Dhs_33.17 //
XXbsa052_u:4591: tat sukhaṃ paramaṃ śāntaṃ vītatṛṣṇai niṣevyate /
XXbsa052_u:4592: niḥsevitaṃ vanamidaṃ ye gatāḥ paramaṃ padam // Dhs_33.18 //
XXbsa052_u:4595: bhikṣūṇāṃ vane vāsa eva sukhāvahaḥ nārhanti sevituṃ ramyaṃ vanaṃ śāntaṃ subhāṣitam /
XXbsa052_u:4596: śāntaṃ ca bhāvitaṃ (caiva) ramate śubhagocare // Dhs_33.20 //
XXbsa052_u:4598: na rāgavyākulaṃ cittaṃ vaneṣu labhate dhṛtim // Dhs_33.21 //
XXbsa052_u:4601: sa ratiṃ labhate śāntiṃ vane puruṣasattamaḥ // Dhs_33.22 //
XXbsa052_u:4602: sukhāya vanaṃ sevyam sa kalparāgakuṭilo nityaṃ rāgādibhirvṛtaḥ /
XXbsa052_u:4603: sa śāntiṃ naiva labhate vane śānte sukhāvahe // Dhs_33.23 //
XXbsa052_u:4604: yeṣāṃ tu manasā nityaṃ vane dhyānaniyoginām /
XXbsa052_u:4605: vanaṃ teṣāṃ sadāramyaṃ na tu rāgagaveṣiṇām // Dhs_33.24 //
XXbsa052_u:4606: vaneṣu bhāvitaṃ cittaṃ nagareṣu na kupyate /
XXbsa052_u:4607: tasmād vanaṃ sadā sevyaṃ nagaraṃ naiva śasyate // Dhs_33.25 //
XXbsa052_u:4609: vikṣipta mohakuṭilaṃ vanaṃ bhūyaḥ prasīdati // Dhs_33.26 //
XXbsa052_u:4610: tasmād vanaṃ paraṃ śāntaṃ yogināmālayaṃ mahat /
XXbsa052_u:4611: saṃsevyaṃ vītamanasā yasya tad vītakalmaṣam // Dhs_33.27 //
XXbsa052_u:4612: ratiṃ mā kṛthā praśāntendriyacittasya yā ratiryogino hṛdi /
XXbsa052_u:4615: na yāmeṣvapi sā dṛṣṭā nityaṃ rāgānurāgiṇī // Dhs_33.29 //
XXbsa052_u:4617: yā tu kleśavaśāt prītiḥ (sā prītiḥ) śāśvatā nahi // Dhs_33.30 //
XXbsa052_u:4620: yasmāt tat pratibaddhaṃ hi śreyasāṃ padamucyate // Dhs_33.31 //
XXbsa052_u:4622: sudṛṣṭaṃ labhate sthānaṃ yatra doṣo na vidyate // Dhs_33.32 //
XXbsa052_u:4623: yaḥ kṣiptamanasā nityaṃ na ca dharmaparāyaṇaḥ /
XXbsa052_u:4624: teṣāṃ vṛthā sukhamidaṃ gacchati na nivartate // Dhs_33.33 //
XXbsa052_u:4625: tattvajñā duḥkhaṃ na paśyanti ye tu tattvavido dhīrāḥ paśyanti jagataḥ sthitim /
XXbsa052_u:4626: anityaduḥkhaśūnyānāṃ teṣāṃ duḥkhaṃ na vidyate // Dhs_33.34 //
XXbsa052_u:4632: sukhasya svarūpam udayavyayadharmāṇāmanityaṃ karmajaṃ hi tat /
XXbsa052_u:4633: tat sukhaṃ sāstravaṃ nityaṃ na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati // Dhs_33.37 //
XXbsa052_u:4634: tat sukhaṃ tadvitṛṣṇasya nīrāgasya hi dehinaḥ /
XXbsa052_u:4635: muktirbhavati doṣasya pārasthasya hi tāpinaḥ // Dhs_33.38 //
XXbsa052_u:4636: tat kiñcit sāsravaṃ saukhyaṃ tat sarva kṣaṇikaṃ matam /
XXbsa052_u:4637: rāgabandhād vinirmuktaṃ tat sarva niścalaṃ sukham // Dhs_33.39 //
XXbsa052_u:4638: ye na kṣipanti duḥkhena sukhe yeṣāṃ na saṅgatiḥ /
XXbsa052_u:4640: anupāyena ye mūḍhāḥ prārthayanti sukhaṃ sadā /
XXbsa052_u:4641: bālukābhiryathā tailaṃ yallabhyaṃ nityameva tat // Dhs_33.41 //
XXbsa052_u:4643: śakro 'pi tat sukhaṃ kartu yathā karma kṛtaṃ mahat // Dhs_33.42 //
XXbsa052_u:4644: sukhāya dharmamācaret sasukhaṃ yasya tu manaḥ saddharmānucaro bhavet /
XXbsa052_u:4645: duḥkhairmuktyabhilāṣo 'yaṃ sa dharme kurute matim // Dhs_33.43 //
XXbsa052_u:4646: nāhetukaṃ sukhaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ duḥkhaṃ vā trividhātmakam /
XXbsa052_u:4647: sukhe duḥkhe pṛthagbhāve tasmānnu sukṛta caret // Dhs_33.44 //
XXbsa052_u:4648: nedaṃ saukhyaṃ sadā śastamadhruvaṃ vipralopi ca /
XXbsa052_u:4650: tat saukhyaṃ (hi)satāṃ śastaṃ yatra mṛtyurna vidyate /
XXbsa052_u:4651: na ca priyeṇa viśleṣo nāpriyeṇa samāgamaḥ // Dhs_33.46 //
XXbsa052_u:4655: yat sukhaṃ duḥkhajanakaṃ kathaṃ tat sukhamiṣyate?
XXbsa052_u:4656: duḥkhād duḥkhataraṃ jñeyaṃ pariṇāmavaśena tat // Dhs_33.48 //
XXbsa052_u:4660: sa dhīmān suraloke ca gatvānyallabhate sukham // Dhs_33.50 //
XXbsa052_u:4661: bhuktaṃ sukhaṃ purāṇaṃ tu hīnakarma karoti ca /
XXbsa052_u:4662: purāṇaṃ sukṛtaṃ śīrṇa mṛtyukāle na budhyate // Dhs_33.51 //
XXbsa052_u:4663: sarva sukhamanityaṃ bhavati yadidaṃ dṛśyate saukhyaṃ manovākkāmajaṃbhṛśam /
XXbsa052_u:4666: cañcalormi sukhaṃ sarva vinipāto bhavārṇave // Dhs_33.53 //
XXbsa052_u:4669: nāśayitvā sukhaṃ sarva nāśayitvā ca jīvitam /
XXbsa052_u:4671: yadatīva sukhaṃ nṛṇāṃ taddhi saukhyāya kalpyate /
XXbsa052_u:4672: yannaiṣyati sukhaṃ kiñcit taddhi naiva vigaṇyate // Dhs_33.56 //
XXbsa052_u:4674: sarva hyanātmajaṃ duḥkhamanityaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ balam // Dhs_33.57 //
XXbsa052_u:4675: laukikaṃ sukhaṃ na sukham yad sukhaṃ triṣu lokeṣu na śastaṃ tattvadarśibhiḥ /
XXbsa052_u:4676: tena matvā kathaṃ devā bhavanti vigatajvarāḥ? // Dhs_33.58 //
XXbsa052_u:4678: yo bhokṣyate surān sarvān śuṣkendhanamivānalaḥ // Dhs_33.59 //
XXbsa052_u:4679: atiyāti sukhaṃ sarva kriyatāṃ śraiyasaṃ manaḥ /
XXbsa052_u:4680: mā paścāt saṃbhavo yoge mṛtyukālo bhaviṣyati // Dhs_33.60 //
XXbsa052_u:4681: sukhamasthiraṃ bhavati janmāntarasahasreṣu yad muktaṃ karmajaṃ sukham /
XXbsa052_u:4685: tasmānna (sukha) saktasya sukhaṃ bhavati naiṣṭhikam // Dhs_33.62 //
XXbsa052_u:4688: sukhī bhavati tat prāpya na sukhaṃ bhavajanmanaḥ /
XXbsa052_u:4690: kāmavirahitaḥ sukhamaśnuvate tasmāt tatsukhasaktānāṃ nityaṃ kāmagaveṣiṇām /
XXbsa052_u:4692: jñānenaivendriyāṇi svagocare nivartante nendriyāṇāṃ jayaḥ śakyaḥ karttu viṣayagocare /
XXbsa052_u:4693: jñānena hi nivartante indriyāṇi svagocare // Dhs_33.66 //
XXbsa052_u:4694: bālā eva gatipañcake bhramanti duḥkhe sukhābhisaṃsaktā nityaṃ bālā (haya)medhasaḥ /
XXbsa052_u:4698: yatra duḥkhaṃ vipākaṃ syāt tat sukhaṃ duḥkhameva tat // Dhs_33.68 //
XXbsa052_u:4699: pāpasyākaraṇameva sukham anyāgatasya duḥkhasya pratighātayate budhaḥ /
XXbsa052_u:4700: pāpasya hetujaṃ duḥkhaṃ pāpasyākaraṇaṃ sukham // Dhs_33.69 //
XXbsa052_u:4704: nivartayati yaḥ pāpād vyasanāccāpi rakṣati // Dhs_34.1 //
XXbsa052_u:4706: mitraṃ bhavati tannṛṇāṃ na mitraṃ pāpakārakam // Dhs_34.2 //
XXbsa052_u:4707: saṃsargajā doṣaguṇā bhavanti apūtiḥ pūtisaṃśleṣāt pūtirevopajāyate /
XXbsa052_u:4710: taddoṣāt sadṛśo dṛṣṭaḥ śubho vā yadi vāśubhaḥ // Dhs_34.4 //
XXbsa052_u:4711: na śubhaṃ duḥkhakārakam śubhārthī puruṣaḥ sarvānaśubhānnaiva sevate /
XXbsa052_u:4712: tenāsau duḥkhamāpnoti na śubhaṃ duḥkhakāraṇam // Dhs_34.5 //
XXbsa052_u:4713: guṇadoṣayorlakṣaṇam saṃśleṣajā guṇāḥ dṛṣṭā doṣāḥ saṃśleṣajātayaḥ /
XXbsa052_u:4715: yaśasā yujyate yo hi nityaṃ sādhusamāgamāt /
XXbsa052_u:4717: satsaṅgatiphalam etat sāraṃ sadā kārya yadasādhuvivarjanam /
XXbsa052_u:4718: sādhubhiśca sadā vāso duṣṭāṇāṃ ca vivarjanam // Dhs_34.8 //
XXbsa052_u:4721: na māninaṃ kusīdaṃ vā nityaṃ sarvānuśaṅkinam /
XXbsa052_u:4726: uttamaṃ bhajamānasya na doṣebhyo bhayaṃ bhavet // Dhs_34.12 //
XXbsa052_u:4729: bhayapradaṃ taṃ mātaṅgaḥ prayāntaṃ naiva paśyati // Dhs_34.13 //
XXbsa052_u:4731: laghutāṃ yāti loke 'smin pretyapāpeṣu pacyate // Dhs_34.14 //
XXbsa052_u:4733: teṣāṃ na suśamaṃ (karma) pretyapāpeṣu pacyate // Dhs_34.15 //
XXbsa052_u:4734: rūpaiśvaryakulārthā ye na te tattvasya bhāginaḥ /
XXbsa052_u:4735: atattvabuddhayo bālā na taranti bhavārṇavam // Dhs_34.16 //
XXbsa052_u:4736: jñānaśīlādiyutaṃ kulaṃ śreṣṭham etatkulaṃ ye vibhavā yaccānyat sukhamiṣyate /
XXbsa052_u:4739: yeṣāṃ jñānaṃ ca śīlaṃ ca te kule mahati sthitāḥ // Dhs_34.18 //
XXbsa052_u:4743: saṃyuktā ye kulīnāste ye na dharmavivarjitāḥ // Dhs_34.20 //
XXbsa052_u:4745: tasmātkulaṃ jñānamayaṃ jñānahīnaṃ na tat kulam // Dhs_34.21 //
XXbsa052_u:4749: sa rājā dhārmiko dhīmān svargalokopapattaye // Dhs_35.1 //
XXbsa052_u:4751: niyataṃ yaḥ karaṃ kāle dharmeṇa paribhujyate /
XXbsa052_u:4752: sa rājā lobhanirmukto yāmānāmadhipo bhavet // Dhs_35.2 //
XXbsa052_u:4753: rājñaḥ svarūpam kṣamāvān priyavākyo yaḥ krodhaharṣādidhārakaḥ /
XXbsa052_u:4754: sa mahīṃ pālayettvenāṃ loke hi śreṣṭhatāṃ gataḥ // Dhs_35.3 //
XXbsa052_u:4757: baddhadarśī mahātmā yo gurupūjaka eva ca /
XXbsa052_u:4760: na ca hiṃsati bhūtāni sa deveṣūpapadyate // Dhs_35.6 //
XXbsa052_u:4762: sa matvāryāṃ mahīṃ kṛtsnāṃ devalokaṃ mahīyate // Dhs_35.7 //
XXbsa052_u:4765: na strīṇāṃ vaśago rājā sādhūnāṃ ca vaset sadā /
XXbsa052_u:4767: na sarvasya vacogrāhī priyaḥ sādhujanasya tu /
XXbsa052_u:4773: sa śuddha eva vimalo yāmānāmadhipo bhavet // Dhs_35.12 //
XXbsa052_u:4776: pravijitya mahīṃ kṛtsnāṃ pretya devapriyo bhavet // Dhs_35.13 //
XXbsa052_u:4777: priyasya tu bhaved vākyaṃ stotrotsavakaraṃ param /
XXbsa052_u:4781: hrāsavṛddhī ca bhūtānāmakasmāt kurute hi yaḥ /
XXbsa052_u:4782: sa rājā vai paro devairdevaloke ca tiṣṭhati // Dhs_35.16 //
XXbsa052_u:4784: sa dhībalābhyāṃ saṃyukto yāmānāmadhipo bhavet // Dhs_35.17 //
XXbsa052_u:4786: yastat pūjayate rājā sa deveṣūpajāyate // Dhs_35.18 //
XXbsa052_u:4787: kālaṃ niyatadarśī yaḥ prajānāṃ ca hite rataḥ /
XXbsa052_u:4790: jñānagocarasampūjyo niyataṃ deva eva saḥ // Dhs_35.20 //
XXbsa052_u:4793: nāśayitvā sa doṣaughān pretya svargeṣu jāyate // Dhs_35.21 //
XXbsa052_u:4794: sanmitraiḥ parivārito rājā devādhipo bhavati hitāni yasya mitrāṇi karmakartṛṇi nityaśaḥ /
XXbsa052_u:4795: sa mitraiḥ samparivṛto nṛpo devādhipo bhavet // Dhs_35.22 //
XXbsa052_u:4797: sa sadyo viṣanirmuktaḥ surāṇāmadhipo bhavet // Dhs_35.23 //
XXbsa052_u:4800: na śaktaḥ pānabhojyeṣu saṃsaktastu śubhe sadā /
XXbsa052_u:4804: dharmodayena dṛṣṭena yathā yāti triviṣṭapam // Dhs_35.26 //
XXbsa052_u:4807: dharmeṇa prajāpālakaḥ svargasukhaṃ yāti dharmeṇaiva prajā nityaṃ prapālayati (yo) nṛpaḥ /
XXbsa052_u:4808: sa dhārmikaḥ praśastātmā suraloke mahīyate // Dhs_35.28 //
XXbsa052_u:4810: yaste prakurute dharmān sa surādhipatāṃ vrajet // Dhs_35.29 //
XXbsa052_u:4813: kīdṛśairguṇayutaiḥ rājā devānāmadhipo bhavati yo devatāṃ pūjayati yathā cāhni mahīpatiḥ /
XXbsa052_u:4814: sa devapūjito bhūyo devānāmadhipo bhavet // Dhs_35.31 //
XXbsa052_u:4819: sa śīlavān divaṃ yāti nityaṃ śīlena rakṣitaḥ // Dhs_35.33 //
XXbsa052_u:4823: sa śīlavān divaṃ yāti nityaṃ śīlena rakṣitaḥ // Dhs_35.35 //
XXbsa052_u:4824: saddharmī rājā eva vasudhādhipatiḥ sadvyāpārāddharmamimaṃ pālayan vasudhādhipaḥ /
XXbsa052_u:4825: praśāsti ca mahīṃ kṛtsnāṃ yāmānāmadhipo bhavet // Dhs_35.36 //
XXbsa052_u:4826: satkarmaniratasya rājño bhṛtyo 'pi śobhate satkarmanirato bhṛtyo nṛpe sadguṇaśālini /
XXbsa052_u:4827: jano nirmalatāṃ yāti śaraccandra ivāmbare // Dhs_35.37 //
XXbsa052_u:4862: tvayā viśodhito vākyaistamaḥ sūryodaye yathā // Dhs_36.15 //
XXbsa052_u:4869: ye ca dharmā hetubhavā teṣāṃ tathāgato 'vadat /
XXbsa052_u:4874: mohāśivādirahitasya vākyavidyasya vipulārjanasya 'dharmasamuccayo' nāma dharmaparyāyaḥ samāptaḥ
